GP12skp031pu:5: prayāge parame puṇye brahmaṇo lokavartmani // SkP_1.3 //
GP12skp031pu:16: kathitaṃ bhāratākhyānaṃ purāṇaṃ ca paraṃ tvayā /
GP12skp031pu:17: tena naḥ pratibhāsi tvaṃ sākṣātsatyavatīsutaḥ // SkP_1.9 //
GP12skp031pu:19: dvijapūjārato nityaṃ tena pṛcchāṃ tvamarhasi // SkP_1.10 //
GP12skp031pu:21: tattvā pṛcchāma vai janma kārttikeyasya dhīmataḥ // SkP_1.11 //
GP12skp031pu:27: brahmaṇyatvaṃ samāhātmyaṃ vīryaṃ ca tridaśādhikam // SkP_1.14 //
GP12skp031pu:31: vicaransa tadā lokān muniḥ satyavatīsutaḥ // SkP_1.16 //
GP12skp031pu:39: vavande parayā bhaktyā sākṣādiva pitāmaham // SkP_1.20 //
GP12skp031pu:41: pariṣvajya paraṃ premṇā provāca vacanaṃ śubham // SkP_1.21 //
GP12skp031pu:45: idamāha vaco viprāś ciraṃ yaddhṛdaye sthitam // SkP_1.23 //
GP12skp031pu:47: kiṃnimittaṃ kuto vāsya icchāmyetaddhi veditum // SkP_1.24 //
GP12skp031pu:50: suparṇyāścātha mātṝṇāṃ kṛttikānāṃ kathaṃ ca saḥ // SkP_1.25 //
GP12skp031pu:61: mahādevaṃ mahātmānaṃ viśvasya jagataḥ patim // SkP_2.1 //
GP12skp031pu:63: svāmitvaṃ ca vibhutvaṃ ca svakṛtāni pracakṣate // SkP_2.2 //
GP12skp031pu:64: tasmai devāya somāya praṇamya prayataḥ śuciḥ /
GP12skp031pu:71: śarvasya darśanaṃ caiva devyāścaiva samudbhavaḥ // SkP_2.6 //
GP12skp031pu:73: menāyāṃ ca yathotpattir yathā devyāḥ svayaṃvaram // SkP_2.7 //
GP12skp031pu:74: devānāṃ varadānaṃ ca vasiṣṭhasya ca dhīmataḥ /
GP12skp031pu:75: parāśarasya cotpattir vyāsasya ca mahātmanaḥ // SkP_2.8 //
GP12skp031pu:79: gaṇānāṃ darśanaṃ caiva kathanaṃ cāpyaśeṣataḥ // SkP_2.10 //
GP12skp031pu:85: agastyasya ca māhātmyaṃ vadhaḥ sundanisundayoḥ // SkP_2.13 //
GP12skp031pu:90: balisaṃyamanaṃ caiva devyāḥ samaya eva ca /
GP12skp031pu:91: devānāṃ gamanaṃ caiva agnerdūtatvameva ca // SkP_2.16 //
GP12skp031pu:92: devānāṃ varadānaṃ ca śukrasya ca visarjanam /
GP12skp031pu:95: āryāvarapradānaṃ ca śailādistava eva ca // SkP_2.18 //
GP12skp031pu:107: nigraho bhujagendrāṇāṃ śikharasya ca pātanam // SkP_2.24 //
GP12skp031pu:111: vadhaśca tārakasyogro yātrā bhadravaṭasya ca // SkP_2.26 //
GP12skp031pu:113: śakteruddharaṇaṃ caiva tārakasya vadhaḥ śubhaḥ // SkP_2.27 //
GP12skp031pu:124: yāṃ śrutvā pāpakarmāpi gacchecca paramāṃ gatim // SkP_3.1 //
GP12skp031pu:126: imāṃ kathāmanubrūyāt tathā cāsūyake nare // SkP_3.2 //
GP12skp031pu:129: kumārabhaktāya tathā śraddadhānāya caiva hi // SkP_3.3 //
GP12skp031pu:131: so 'jñānātpitaraṃ brahmā na veda tamasāvṛtaḥ // SkP_3.4 //
GP12skp031pu:134: putra putreti cāpyukto brahmā śarveṇa dhīmatā /
GP12skp031pu:135: praṇataḥ prāñjalirbhūtvā tameva śaraṇaṃ gataḥ // SkP_3.6 //
GP12skp031pu:136: sa dattvā brahmaṇe śambhuḥ sraṣṭṛtvaṃ jñānasaṃhitam /
GP12skp031pu:137: vibhutvaṃ caiva lokānām antardhe parameśvaraḥ // SkP_3.7 //
GP12skp031pu:139: yāṃ śrutvā yogino dhyānāt prapadyante maheśvaram // SkP_3.8 //
GP12skp031pu:140: brahmaṃ ca yo vidadhe putramagre jñānaṃ ca yaḥ prahiṇoti sma tasmai /
GP12skp031pu:141: tamātmasthaṃ ye 'nupaśyanti dhīrās teṣāṃ śāntiḥ śāśvatī netareṣām // SkP_3.9 //
GP12skp031pu:142: sa vyāsa pitaraṃ dṛṣṭvā svadīptyā parayā yutam /
GP12skp031pu:143: putrakāmaḥ prajāhetos tapastīvraṃ cakāra ha // SkP_3.10 //
GP12skp031pu:145: acireṇaiva kālena pitā sampratutoṣa ha // SkP_3.11 //
GP12skp031pu:147: sa tuṣṭāva nato bhūtvā kṛtvā śirasi cāñjalim // SkP_3.12 //
GP12skp031pu:149: sraṣṭre vai lokatantrāya brahmaṇaḥ pataye namaḥ // SkP_3.13 //
GP12skp031pu:155: dṛṣṭidāya ca sarveṣāṃ svayaṃ vai darśanāya ca // SkP_3.16 //
GP12skp031pu:157: manasaḥ karaṇānāṃ ca tatraiva niyamasya ca // SkP_3.17 //
GP12skp031pu:158: bhūtānāṃ guṇakartre ca śaktidāya tathaiva ca /
GP12skp031pu:159: kartre hyaṇḍasya mahyaṃ ca acintyāyāgrajāya ca /
GP12skp031pu:160: aprameya pitarnityaṃ prīto no diśa śakvarīm // SkP_3.18 //
GP12skp031pu:162: tuṣṭo 'bravītsvayaṃ putraṃ brahmāṇaṃ praṇataṃ tathā // SkP_3.19 //
GP12skp031pu:164: tasmādbrahmeti lokeṣu nāmnā khyātiṃ gamiṣyasi // SkP_3.20 //
GP12skp031pu:166: tasmātpitāmahatvaṃ te loke khyātiṃ gamiṣyati // SkP_3.21 //
GP12skp031pu:167: prajārthaṃ yacca te taptaṃ tapa ugraṃ suduścaram /
GP12skp031pu:171: bhāvāśca sarve te devam upatasthuḥ svarūpiṇaḥ // SkP_3.23 //
GP12skp031pu:174: tābhiḥ svaṃ svaṃ samādāya bhāvaṃ divyamatarkitam /
GP12skp031pu:176: tatraivaṃ yoginaḥ sūkṣmaṃ dṛṣṭvā divyena cakṣuṣā /
GP12skp031pu:178: rudraḥ sraṣṭā hi sarveṣāṃ bhūtānāṃ tava ca prabho /
GP12skp031pu:184: sarveṣāṃ manasi sadāvatiṣṭhamāno jānānaḥ śubhamaśubhaṃ ca bhūtanāthaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:185: taṃ devaṃ pramathapatiṃ praṇamya bhaktyā nityaṃ vai śaraṇamupaimi sūkṣmasūkṣmam // SkP_3.30 //
GP12skp031pu:189: prājāpatyaṃ tato labdhvā prajāḥ sraṣṭuṃ pracakrame /
GP12skp031pu:190: prajāstāḥ sṛjyamānāśca na vivardhanti tasya ha // SkP_4.1 //
GP12skp031pu:192: sṛṣṭyarthaṃ bhūya evātha tapaścartuṃ pracakrame // SkP_4.2 //
GP12skp031pu:198: śambhuḥ prāha varaṃ vatsa yācasveti pitāmaham // SkP_4.4 //
GP12skp031pu:200: sa jñātvā tasya saṃkalpaṃ brahmaṇaḥ parameśvaraḥ /
GP12skp031pu:201: mūḍho 'yamiti saṃcintya provāca varadaḥ svayam // SkP_4.5 //
GP12skp031pu:202: āgataṃ pitaraṃ mā tvaṃ yasmātputraṃ samīhase /
GP12skp031pu:204: sa ca te putratāṃ yātvā madīyo gaṇanāyakaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:205: rudro vigrahavānbhūtvā mūḍha tvāṃ vinayiṣyati // SkP_4.7 //
GP12skp031pu:207: balasyādhipatitvaṃ ca astrāṇāṃ ca prayoktṛtā // SkP_4.8 //
GP12skp031pu:209: dhanuḥ pinākaṃ śūlaṃ ca khaḍgaṃ paraśureva ca // SkP_4.9 //
GP12skp031pu:212: evaṃ sarvarddhisampannaḥ sutaste sa bhaviṣyati // SkP_4.10 //
GP12skp031pu:214: brahmā cakre tadā ceṣṭiṃ putrakāmaḥ prajāpatiḥ // SkP_4.11 //
GP12skp031pu:216: samidyuktena hastena lalāṭaṃ pramamārja ha // SkP_4.12 //
GP12skp031pu:218: papāta jvalane tasmin dviguṇaṃ tasya tejasā // SkP_4.13 //
GP12skp031pu:219: taddhi māheśvaraṃ tejaḥ saṃdhitaṃ brahmaṇi srutam /
GP12skp031pu:222: preṣito gaṇapo rudraḥ sadya evābhavattadā // SkP_4.15 //
GP12skp031pu:226: tryakṣo daśabhujaḥ śrīmān brahmāṇaṃ chādayanniva // SkP_4.17 //
GP12skp031pu:228: stutvā taṃ sarvagaṃ devaṃ nīlalohitamavyayam // SkP_4.18 //
GP12skp031pu:230: asṛjadvividhāstvanyāḥ prajāḥ sa jagati prabhuḥ // SkP_4.19 //
GP12skp031pu:235: atha kālena mahatā kalpe 'tīte punaḥ punaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:236: prajā dhārayato yogād asminkalpa upasthite // SkP_4.22 //
GP12skp031pu:238: prajāsu ca vivṛddhāsu prayāge yajataśca ha // SkP_4.23 //
GP12skp031pu:244: khinnā vivadamānāśca na ca paśyāma yatparam // SkP_4.26 //
GP12skp031pu:245: etaṃ naḥ saṃśayaṃ deva ciraṃ hṛdi samāsthitam /
GP12skp031pu:246: tvaṃ hi vettha yathātattvaṃ kāraṇaṃ paramaṃ hi naḥ // SkP_4.27 //
GP12skp031pu:248: kena cādhiṣṭhitaṃ viśvaṃ ko nityaḥ kaśca śāśvataḥ // SkP_4.28 //
GP12skp031pu:252: kathaṃ paśyema taṃ caiva etannaḥ śaṃsa sarvaśaḥ // SkP_4.30 //
GP12skp031pu:254: devānāṃ ca ṛṣīṇāṃ ca gandharvoragarakṣasām // SkP_4.31 //
GP12skp031pu:255: yakṣāṇāmasurāṇāṃ ca ye ca kutra pravartakāḥ /
GP12skp031pu:257: utthāya prāñjaliḥ prāha rudreti triḥ plutaṃ vacaḥ // SkP_4.32 //
GP12skp031pu:258: sa cāpi tapasā śakyo draṣṭuṃ nānyena kenacit /
GP12skp031pu:260: tasya vaśyāni bhūtāni tenedaṃ dhāryate jagat // SkP_4.33 //
GP12skp031pu:263: kiṃ tanmahattapo deva yena dṛśyeta sa prabhuḥ /
GP12skp031pu:264: tanno vadasva deveśa varadaṃ cābhidhatsva naḥ // SkP_4.35 //
GP12skp031pu:267: deśaṃ ca vaḥ pravakṣyāmi yasmindeśe cariṣyatha // SkP_4.36 //
GP12skp031pu:268: tato manomayaṃ cakraṃ sa sṛṣṭvā tānuvāca ha /
GP12skp031pu:269: kṣiptametanmayā cakram anuvrajata mā ciram // SkP_4.37 //
GP12skp031pu:270: yatrāsya nemiḥ śīryeta sa deśastapasaḥ śubhaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:271: tato mumoca taccakraṃ te ca tatsamanuvrajan // SkP_4.38 //
GP12skp031pu:272: tasya vai vrajataḥ kṣipraṃ yatra nemiraśīryata /
GP12skp031pu:273: naimiśaṃ tatsmṛtaṃ nāmnā puṇyaṃ sarvatra pūjitam // SkP_4.39 //
GP12skp031pu:275: yakṣaiḥ sagandharvapiśācasaṃghaiḥ sarvāpsarobhiśca diteḥ sutaiśca // SkP_4.40 //
GP12skp031pu:276: vipraiśca dāntaiḥ śamayogayuktais tīrthaiśca sarvairapi cāvanīdhraiḥ /
GP12skp031pu:277: gandharvavidyādharacāraṇaiśca sādhyaiśca viśvaiḥ pitṛbhiḥ stutaṃ ca // SkP_4.41 //
GP12skp031pu:286: sarvakriyāḥ prakurvāṇās tameva manasā gatāḥ // SkP_5.3 //
GP12skp031pu:289: dadau sa rūpī bhagavān darśanaṃ sattriṇāṃ śubhaḥ // SkP_5.4 //
GP12skp031pu:292: papracchurudbhavaṃ kṛtsnaṃ jagataḥ pralayaṃ tathā // SkP_5.5 //
GP12skp031pu:293: sthitiṃ ca kṛtsnāṃ vaṃśāṃśca yugamanvantarāṇi ca /
GP12skp031pu:294: vaṃśānucaritaṃ kṛtsnaṃ divyamānaṃ tathaiva ca // SkP_5.6 //
GP12skp031pu:296: pitṛsargaṃ tathāśeṣaṃ brahmaṇo mānameva ca // SkP_5.7 //
GP12skp031pu:301: divyaṃ varṣasahasraṃ ca teṣāṃ tadabhiyāttathā // SkP_5.9 //
GP12skp031pu:315: tāmapṛcchanta kā nveṣā vāyuṃ devaṃ mahādhiyam // SkP_5.16 //
GP12skp031pu:317: śuddhāḥ stha tapasā sarve mahāndharmaśca vaḥ kṛtaḥ // SkP_5.17 //
GP12skp031pu:321: nāsyāḥ puṇyatamā kācit triṣu lokeṣu vidyate // SkP_5.19 //
GP12skp031pu:324: kāraṇaṃ kiṃ ca tatrāsīd etadicchāma veditum // SkP_5.20 //
GP12skp031pu:327: brahmaṇaścaiva saṃvādaṃ purā yajñasya caiva ha // SkP_5.21 //
GP12skp031pu:328: yajñairiṣṭvā purā devo brahmā dīptena tejasā /
GP12skp031pu:330: sa dṛṣṭvā dīptimāndevo dīptyā paramayā yutaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:333: amanyata na me 'nyo 'sti samo loke na cādhikaḥ // SkP_5.24 //
GP12skp031pu:336: ahaṃ sraṣṭā hi bhūtānāṃ nānyaḥ kaścana vidyate /
GP12skp031pu:337: niyantā lokakartā ca na mayāsti samaḥ kvacit // SkP_5.26 //
GP12skp031pu:339: uvāca cainaṃ dīptātmā maivaṃ maṃsthā mahāmate /
GP12skp031pu:340: ayaṃ hi tava saṃmoho vināśāya bhaviṣyati // SkP_5.27 //
GP12skp031pu:342: sraṣṭā tvaṃ caiva nānyo 'sti tathāpi na yaśaskaram // SkP_5.28 //
GP12skp031pu:343: ahaṃ kartā hi bhūtānāṃ bhuvanasya tathaiva ca /
GP12skp031pu:344: karomi na ca saṃmohaṃ yathā tvaṃ deva katthase // SkP_5.29 //
GP12skp031pu:345: tamuvāca tadā brahmā na tvaṃ dhārayitā vibho /
GP12skp031pu:346: ahameva hi bhūtānāṃ dhartā bhartā tathaiva ca /
GP12skp031pu:347: mayā sṛṣṭāni bhūtāni tvamevātra vimuhyase // SkP_5.30 //
GP12skp031pu:349: uvāca caiva tau vedo naitadevamiti prabhuḥ // SkP_5.31 //
GP12skp031pu:350: ahaṃ śreṣṭho mahābhāgau na vadāmyanṛtaṃ kvacit /
GP12skp031pu:351: śṛṇudhvaṃ mama yaḥ kartā bhūtānāṃ yuvayośca ha // SkP_5.32 //
GP12skp031pu:353: yenāhaṃ tava dattaśca kṛtastvaṃ ca prajāpatiḥ // SkP_5.33 //
GP12skp031pu:355: sarvaṃ tasmātprasūtaṃ vai nānyaḥ kartāsti naḥ kvacit // SkP_5.34 //
GP12skp031pu:357: ahaṃ śrutīnāṃ sarvāsāṃ netā sraṣṭā tathaiva ca // SkP_5.35 //
GP12skp031pu:361: evamukte tadā tena mahāñchabdo babhūva ha /
GP12skp031pu:366: vyomagaśca ciraṃ bhūtvā bhūmigaḥ sambabhūva ha // SkP_5.38 //
GP12skp031pu:367: tato brahmā diśaḥ sarvā nirīkṣya mukhapaṅkajaiḥ /
GP12skp031pu:368: caturbhirna viyatsthaṃ tam apaśyatsa pitāmahaḥ // SkP_5.39 //
GP12skp031pu:369: sa mukhaṃ pañcamaṃ dīptam asṛjanmūrdhni saṃsthitam /
GP12skp031pu:372: taṃ dṛṣṭvā pañcamaṃ tasya śiro vai krodhajaṃ mahat /
GP12skp031pu:377: cakarta tanmahadghoraṃ brahmaṇaḥ pañcamaṃ śiraḥ // SkP_5.43 //
GP12skp031pu:380: tataḥ suptotthita iva saṃjñāṃ labdhvā mahātapāḥ /
GP12skp031pu:384: namo vivṛtavaktrāya śatavaktrāya vai namaḥ // SkP_5.46 //
GP12skp031pu:386: namaḥ sahasrapādāya sarvapādāya vai namaḥ // SkP_5.47 //
GP12skp031pu:388: namaḥ sarvasya sraṣṭre ca draṣṭre sarvasya te namaḥ // SkP_5.48 //
GP12skp031pu:390: sṛṣṭipralayakartre ca sthitikartre tathā namaḥ // SkP_5.49 //
GP12skp031pu:392: saṃhāraliṅgine caiva jalaliṅgāya vai namaḥ // SkP_5.50 //
GP12skp031pu:396: bhūtabhavyāya śarvāya nityaṃ sattvavadāya ca // SkP_5.52 //
GP12skp031pu:397: tvameva sraṣṭā lokānāṃ mantā dātā tathā vibho /
GP12skp031pu:399: tasyaivaṃ stuvataḥ samyag bhāvena parameṇa ha /
GP12skp031pu:400: sa tasmai devadeveśo divyaṃ cakṣuradāttadā // SkP_5.54 //
GP12skp031pu:401: cakṣuṣā tena sa tadā brahmā lokapitāmahaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:405: viśadāṃ putra putreti pūrvaṃ devena coditām // SkP_5.56 //
GP12skp031pu:407: yacca pūrvaṃ mayā proktas tvaṃ tadā sutamārgaṇe // SkP_5.57 //
GP12skp031pu:409: sa prāpya paramaṃ jñānaṃ mūḍha tvā vinayiṣyati // SkP_5.58 //
GP12skp031pu:411: mayaiva kāritā tena nirvṛtaścādhunā bhava // SkP_5.59 //
GP12skp031pu:414: stavenānena tuṣṭo 'smi kiṃ dadāni ca te 'nagha // SkP_5.60 //
GP12skp031pu:416: tataḥ sa bhagavānhṛṣṭaḥ praṇamya śubhayā girā /
GP12skp031pu:419: icchāmi śiraso hyasya dhāraṇaṃ sarvadā tvayā /
GP12skp031pu:422: tathā ca kṛtyamuddiśya paśyeyaṃ tvā yathāsukham // SkP_5.63 //
GP12skp031pu:425: śiraśchetsyati yajñasya bibhartsyati śiraśca te // SkP_5.64 //
GP12skp031pu:428: sayajñaḥ sahavedaśca svaṃ lokaṃ pratyapadyata // SkP_5.65 //
GP12skp031pu:431: sa dehabhedamāsādya sāyujyaṃ brahmaṇo vrajet // SkP_5.66 //
GP12skp031pu:435: ākhyeyaṃ nāpi cājñāya na śaṭhāya na mānine // SkP_5.68 //
GP12skp031pu:437: kṛtāvakāśo bhavatīha mānavaḥ śarīrabhede praviśetpitāmaham // SkP_5.69 //
GP12skp031pu:442: ājñayā parameśasya jagrāha brahmaṇaḥ śiraḥ // SkP_6.1 //
GP12skp031pu:444: yogakrīḍāṃ samāsthāya bhaikṣāya pracacāra ha // SkP_6.2 //
GP12skp031pu:446: na cāsya kaścittāṃ bhikṣām anurūpāmadādvibhoḥ // SkP_6.3 //
GP12skp031pu:449: sa dṛṣṭvā tadupasthaṃ tu viṣṇurvai yogacakṣuṣā /
GP12skp031pu:451: papāta sā ca vistīrṇā yojanārdhaśataṃ tadā // SkP_6.5 //
GP12skp031pu:454: tamuvāca tato devaḥ prahasya vacanaṃ śubham // SkP_6.6 //
GP12skp031pu:458: varaṃ varaya bhadraṃ te varado 'smi tavādya vai // SkP_6.8 //
GP12skp031pu:460: eṣa eva varaḥ ślāghyo yadahaṃ devatādhipam /
GP12skp031pu:461: paśyāmi śaṃkaraṃ devam ugraṃ śarvaṃ kapardinam // SkP_6.9 //
GP12skp031pu:462: devaśchāyāṃ tato vīkṣya kapālasthe tadā rase /
GP12skp031pu:463: sasarja puruṣaṃ dīptaṃ viṣṇoḥ sadṛśamūrjitam // SkP_6.10 //
GP12skp031pu:466: devakāryakaraḥ śrīmān sahānena carasva ca // SkP_6.11 //
GP12skp031pu:468: narastasmāddhi nāmnā tvaṃ priyaścāsya bhaviṣyasi // SkP_6.12 //
GP12skp031pu:470: taṃ tadāśvāsya nikṣipya naraṃ viṣṇoḥ svayaṃ prabhuḥ /
GP12skp031pu:472: ya idaṃ narajanmeha śṛṇuyādvā paṭheta vā /
GP12skp031pu:473: sa kīrtyā parayā yukto viṣṇuloke mahīyate // SkP_6.14 //
GP12skp031pu:478: bhaikṣyaṃ bhaikṣyamiti procya dvāre samavatiṣṭhata // SkP_7.1 //
GP12skp031pu:480: jñātvā yogena mahatā tuṣṭāva bhuvaneśvaram // SkP_7.2 //
GP12skp031pu:482: vṛṇīṣva varamavyagro yaste manasi vartate // SkP_7.3 //
GP12skp031pu:485: yena cihnena loko 'yaṃ cihnitaḥ syājjagatpate // SkP_7.4 //
GP12skp031pu:487: sarvaśrutimayaṃ brahma omiti vyājahāra ha // SkP_7.5 //
GP12skp031pu:495: imaṃ lokaṃ varāmbhobhiḥ pāvayitvā ca suprabhe /
GP12skp031pu:496: sarvāṃl lokāṃstārayitrī punastvaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ // SkP_7.9 //
GP12skp031pu:498: puṇyā ca sarvasaritāṃ bhaviṣyasi na saṃśayaḥ // SkP_7.10 //
GP12skp031pu:503: tato viniḥsṛtā bhūyaḥ semaṃ lokamapāvayat // SkP_7.12 //
GP12skp031pu:512: hālāhala iti khyātas taṃ deśaṃ so 'bhyagacchata // SkP_7.16 //
GP12skp031pu:519: āyāti tvarito yūyaṃ tasmādenaṃ nihanyatha // SkP_7.19 //
GP12skp031pu:521: bhittvā śūlena saṃkruddhā vigatāsuṃ ca cakrire // SkP_7.20 //
GP12skp031pu:522: hate tasmiṃstadā devo diśaḥ sarvā avaikṣata /
GP12skp031pu:527: bhakṣayanti sma mahiṣaṃ mitvā mitvā yatastu tāḥ /
GP12skp031pu:530: mahākapālaṃ tattasmāt triṣu lokeṣu gadyate // SkP_7.24 //
GP12skp031pu:536: bhaviṣyati na saṃdehaḥ siddhakṣetraṃ mahātmanaḥ // SkP_7.27 //
GP12skp031pu:537: śmeti hi procyate pāpaṃ kṣayaṃ śānaṃ vidurbudhāḥ /
GP12skp031pu:540: evaṃ tatra naraḥ pāpaṃ sarvameva prahāsyati /
GP12skp031pu:546: tataḥ sa tatra saṃsthāpya devasyārcādvayaṃ śubham /
GP12skp031pu:551: kaśmīraḥ so 'bhavannāmnā deśaḥ puṇyatamaḥ sadā // SkP_7.33 //
GP12skp031pu:552: tato devaḥ saha gaṇai rūpaṃ vikṛtamāsthitaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:561: paṭhennaro yaḥ śṛṇuyācca sarvadā tripiṣṭapaṃ gacchati so 'bhinanditaḥ // SkP_7.38 //
GP12skp031pu:572: yadā vo bhavitā vighnaṃ tadā niṣkalmaṣaṃ tapaḥ // SkP_8.3 //
GP12skp031pu:573: vighnaṃ taccaiva saṃtīrya tapastaptvā ca bhāsvaram /
GP12skp031pu:574: yogaṃ prāpya mahadyuktās tato drakṣyatha śaṃkaram // SkP_8.4 //
GP12skp031pu:577: niḥsomāṃ pṛthivīṃ kṛtvā kṛtsnāmetāṃ tato dvijāḥ /
GP12skp031pu:580: svarbhānunā hṛtaḥ somas tataste duḥkhitābhavan // SkP_8.7 //
GP12skp031pu:583: ūcuścainaṃ mahābhāgā hṛtaḥ somo hi naḥ prabho /
GP12skp031pu:584: kenāpi tadbhavānkṣipram ihānayatu mā ciram // SkP_8.9 //
GP12skp031pu:586: uvāca sa tadā viprān praṇamya bhayapīḍitaḥ // SkP_8.10 //
GP12skp031pu:588: na ca taṃ vedmi kenāsau kva vā nīta iti prabhuḥ // SkP_8.11 //
GP12skp031pu:590: ūcuḥ sarve susaṃrabdhā ilāputraṃ mahāmatim // SkP_8.12 //
GP12skp031pu:592: na ca nastadbhayaṃ śakto vināśayitumāśvapi // SkP_8.13 //
GP12skp031pu:596: tapasā svena rājendra paśya no balamuttamam // SkP_8.15 //
GP12skp031pu:600: rūpiṇī darśanaṃ prādād uvācedaṃ ca tāndvijān // SkP_8.17 //
GP12skp031pu:601: tuṣṭāsmi vatsāḥ kiṃ vo 'dya karomi varadāsmi vaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:602: brūta tatkṛtameveha bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ // SkP_8.18 //
GP12skp031pu:605: tamānaya namaste 'stu eṣa no vara uttamaḥ // SkP_8.19 //
GP12skp031pu:607: sā tathoktā viniścitya dṛṣṭvā divyena cakṣuṣā /
GP12skp031pu:611: te tamāsādya ṛṣayaḥ prāpya yajñaphalaṃ mahat /
GP12skp031pu:614: āgatya tānṛṣīnprāha tapaḥ kuruta mā ciram // SkP_8.23 //
GP12skp031pu:615: te saha brahmaṇā gatvā mainākaṃ parvatottamam /
GP12skp031pu:619: te yuktā brahmaṇā sārdham ṛṣayaḥ saha devataiḥ /
GP12skp031pu:626: divyaṃ cakṣuḥ prayacchāmi paśyadhvaṃ māṃ yathepsitam // SkP_8.29 //
GP12skp031pu:639: tamapaśyanta te sarve devā divyena cakṣuṣā /
GP12skp031pu:640: yaṃ dṛṣṭvā na bhavenmṛtyur martyasyāpi kadācana // SkP_8.35 //
GP12skp031pu:643: prasamīkṣya mahāsureśakālaṃ manasā cāpi vicārya durvisahyam /
GP12skp031pu:644: praṇamanti gatātmabhāvacintāḥ saha devairjagadudbhavaṃ stuvantaḥ // SkP_8.37 //
GP12skp031pu:648: te dṛṣṭvā devadeveśaṃ sarve sabrahmakāḥ surāḥ /
GP12skp031pu:662: namaḥ parvatavāsāya śirohartre ca me purā // SkP_9.7 //
GP12skp031pu:666: namo narasya kartre ca sthitikartre namaḥ sadā /
GP12skp031pu:667: utpattipralayānāṃ ca kartre sarvasahāya ca // SkP_9.9 //
GP12skp031pu:669: śivaḥ saumyaśca deveśa bhava no bhaktavatsala // SkP_9.10 //
GP12skp031pu:674: varaṃ brūta pradāsyāmi suniścintya sa ucyatām // SkP_9.12 //
GP12skp031pu:679: yadi tuṣṭo 'si deveśa yadi deyo varaśca naḥ /
GP12skp031pu:680: tasmācchivaśca saumyaśca dṛśyaścaiva bhavasva naḥ // SkP_9.14 //
GP12skp031pu:682: sarvakāryeṣu ca sadā hitaḥ pathyaśca śaṃkaraḥ // SkP_9.15 //
GP12skp031pu:684: eṣa no dīyatāṃ deva varo varasahasrada // SkP_9.16 //
GP12skp031pu:688: ardhena tejasaḥ svasya mukhādulkāṃ sasarja ha /
GP12skp031pu:690: sākāśaṃ dyāṃ ca bhūmiṃ ca mahimnā vyāpya viṣṭhitā /
GP12skp031pu:691: upatasthe ca deveśaṃ dīpyamānā yathā taḍit // SkP_9.19 //
GP12skp031pu:693: brahmāṇaṃ devi varadam ārādhaya śucismite // SkP_9.20 //
GP12skp031pu:696: phalaṃ phalavatāṃ śreṣṭhā yadbravīmi tapodhanāḥ // SkP_9.21 //
GP12skp031pu:698: madbhaktāstapasā yuktā ihaiva ca nivatsyatha // SkP_9.22 //
GP12skp031pu:700: puṇyaṃ pavitraṃ sthānaṃ vai bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ // SkP_9.23 //
GP12skp031pu:702: svarṇākṣīṃ cāsṛjaṃ devīṃ svarṇākṣaṃ tena tatsmṛtam // SkP_9.24 //
GP12skp031pu:704: nivatsyatha mayājñaptāḥ svarṇākṣaṃ vai tataśca ha /
GP12skp031pu:705: samantādyojanaṃ kṣetraṃ pavitraṃ tanna saṃśayaḥ // SkP_9.25 //
GP12skp031pu:710: upoṣya triguṇāṃ rātriṃ caruṃ kṛtvā nivedya ca /
GP12skp031pu:711: yatra tatra mṛtaḥ so 'pi brahmaloke nivatsyati // SkP_9.27 //
GP12skp031pu:714: niyamena mṛtaścātra mayā saha cariṣyati // SkP_9.28 //
GP12skp031pu:717: evaṃ sa tānṛṣīnuktvā dṛṣṭvā saumyena cakṣuṣā /
GP12skp031pu:722: jayati jaladavāhaḥ sarvabhūtāntakālaḥ śamadamaniyatānāṃ kleśahartā yatīnām /
GP12skp031pu:723: jananamaraṇahartā ceṣṭatāṃ dhārmikāṇāṃ vividhakaraṇayuktaḥ khecaraḥ pādacārī // SkP_9.32 //
GP12skp031pu:729: sā devī tryambakaproktā tatāpa suciraṃ tapaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:731: vāyvāhārā punaścāpi abbhakṣā bhūya eva ca // SkP_10.1 //
GP12skp031pu:733: uvāca brūhi tuṣṭo 'smi devi kiṃ karavāṇi te // SkP_10.2 //
GP12skp031pu:735: vicareyaṃ sukhaṃ deva sarvāṃl lokānnamastava // SkP_10.3 //
GP12skp031pu:737: na hi yena śarīreṇa kriyate paramaṃ tapaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:740: jāyasva duhitā bhūtvā patiṃ rudramavāpsyasi // SkP_10.5 //
GP12skp031pu:741: tataḥ sā tadvacaḥ śrutvā yogāddevī manasvinī /
GP12skp031pu:742: dakṣasya duhitā jajñe satī nāmātiyoginī // SkP_10.6 //
GP12skp031pu:749: anyāḥ sṛjasva bhadraṃ te prajā mṛtyusamanvitāḥ /
GP12skp031pu:750: tena coktaṃ sthito 'smīti sthāṇustena tataḥ smṛtaḥ // SkP_10.10 //
GP12skp031pu:753: sthito 'smi vacanātte 'dya vaktavyo nāsmi te punaḥ // SkP_10.11 //
GP12skp031pu:754: ye tvime mānasāḥ sṛṣṭā mahātmāno mahābalāḥ /
GP12skp031pu:755: cariṣyanti mayā sārdhaṃ sarva ete hi yājñikāḥ // SkP_10.12 //
GP12skp031pu:757: atha kāle gate vyāsa sa dakṣaḥ śāpakāraṇāt /
GP12skp031pu:760: satī jñātvā tu tatsarvaṃ gatvā pitaramabravīt // SkP_10.14 //
GP12skp031pu:761: ahaṃ jyeṣṭhā variṣṭhā ca jāmātrā saha suvrata /
GP12skp031pu:762: māṃ hitvā nārhase hyetāḥ saha bhartṛbhirarcitum // SkP_10.15 //
GP12skp031pu:766: na tvaṃ tathā pūjayase saha bhartrā mahāvrate // SkP_10.17 //
GP12skp031pu:769: tasmādyatte karomyadya śubhaṃ vā yadi vāśubham /
GP12skp031pu:770: pūjāṃ gṛhāṇa tāṃ putri gaccha vā yatra rocate // SkP_10.19 //
GP12skp031pu:773: pūjāmasaṃmatāṃ hīnām idaṃ covāca taṃ śubhā // SkP_10.20 //
GP12skp031pu:775: ślāghyāṃ caivāpyaduṣṭāṃ ca śreṣṭhāṃ māṃ garhase pitaḥ // SkP_10.21 //
GP12skp031pu:777: asatkṛtāyāḥ kiṃ me 'dya jīvitenāśubhena ha // SkP_10.22 //
GP12skp031pu:779: tataḥ kṛtvā namaskāraṃ manasā tryambakāya ha /
GP12skp031pu:784: tataḥ sā dhāraṇāṃ kṛtvā āgneyīṃ sahasā satī /
GP12skp031pu:785: dadāha vai svakaṃ dehaṃ svasamutthena vahninā // SkP_10.25 //
GP12skp031pu:786: tāṃ jñātvā tryambako devīṃ tathābhūtāṃ mahāyaśāḥ /
GP12skp031pu:787: uvāca dakṣaṃ saṃgamya idaṃ vacanakovidaḥ // SkP_10.26 //
GP12skp031pu:791: tvaṃ caiva mama śāpena kṣatriyo bhavitā nṛpaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:793: dharmavighnaṃ ca te tatra kariṣye krūrakarmaṇaḥ // SkP_10.28 //
GP12skp031pu:795: tamuvāca tadā dakṣo dūyatā hṛdayena vai /
GP12skp031pu:796: mayā yadi sutā svā vai proktā tyaktāpi vā punaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:797: kiṃ tavātra kṛtaṃ deva ahaṃ tasyāḥ prabhuḥ sadā // SkP_10.29 //
GP12skp031pu:799: bhūrloke vatsyase nityaṃ na svarloke kadācana // SkP_10.30 //
GP12skp031pu:800: bhāgaṃ ca tava yajñeṣu dattvā sarve dvijātayaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:801: apaḥ sprakṣyanti sarvatra mahādeva mahādyute // SkP_10.31 //
GP12skp031pu:803: tataḥ sa devaḥ prahasaṃs tamuvāca trilocanaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:804: sarveṣāmeva lokānāṃ mūlaṃ bhūrloka ucyate // SkP_10.32 //
GP12skp031pu:806: bhūrloke hi dhṛte lokāḥ sarve tiṣṭhanti śāśvatāḥ /
GP12skp031pu:807: tasmāttiṣṭhāmyahaṃ nityam ihaiva na tavājñayā // SkP_10.33 //
GP12skp031pu:809: apaḥ spṛśanti śuddhyarthaṃ bhāgaṃ yacchanti me tataḥ /
GP12skp031pu:812: aśuciṃ spraṣṭukāmāśca tyaktvāpaḥ saṃspṛśanti ca // SkP_10.35 //
GP12skp031pu:814: bhāgānapaḥ spṛśanti sma tatra kā paridevanā // SkP_10.36 //
GP12skp031pu:818: evaṃ sa bhagavāñchaptvā dakṣaṃ devo jagatpatiḥ /
GP12skp031pu:819: virarāma mahātejā jagāma ca yathāgatam // SkP_10.38 //
GP12skp031pu:829: apṛcchaddhimavānpraśnaṃ loke khyātikaraṃ nu kim // SkP_11.1 //
GP12skp031pu:830: kenākṣayāśca lokāḥ syuḥ khyātiśca paramā mune /
GP12skp031pu:831: tathaiva cārcanīyatvaṃ satsu taṃ kathayasva me // SkP_11.2 //
GP12skp031pu:834: mama khyātirapatyena brahmaṇo ṛṣibhiśca ha // SkP_11.3 //
GP12skp031pu:835: kiṃ na paśyasi śailendra yato māṃ paripṛcchasi /
GP12skp031pu:836: vartayiṣyāmi taccāpi yanme dṛṣṭaṃ purācala // SkP_11.4 //
GP12skp031pu:840: tānahaṃ tapasā jñātvā tatraivāntarhitaḥ sthitaḥ // SkP_11.6 //
GP12skp031pu:844: viveśa taṃ tadā deśaṃ sā gartā yatra bhūdhara // SkP_11.8 //
GP12skp031pu:846: apaśyadārto duḥkhārtān apṛcchattāṃśca sa dvijaḥ // SkP_11.9 //
GP12skp031pu:848: duḥkhitāḥ kena mokṣaśca yuṣmākaṃ bhavitānaghāḥ // SkP_11.10 //
GP12skp031pu:851: prapitāmahāśca kliśyāmas tava duṣṭena karmaṇā // SkP_11.11 //
GP12skp031pu:853: tvaṃ cāpi vīraṇastambas tvayi lambāmahe vayam // SkP_11.12 //
GP12skp031pu:854: yāvattvaṃ jīvase vipra tāvadeva vayaṃ sthitāḥ /
GP12skp031pu:855: mṛte tvayi gamiṣyāmo narakaṃ pāpacetasaḥ // SkP_11.13 //
GP12skp031pu:858: nānyena tapasā putra na tīrthānāṃ phalena ca /
GP12skp031pu:860: sa tatheti pratijñāya ārādhya ca vṛṣadhvajam /
GP12skp031pu:862: svayaṃ ca rudradayitaḥ sukeśo nāma nāmataḥ /
GP12skp031pu:867: sa evamukto ṛṣiṇā śailendro niyame sthitaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:868: tapaścakāra vipulaṃ yena brahmā tutoṣa ha // SkP_11.19 //
GP12skp031pu:870: brūhi tuṣṭo 'smi te śaila tapasānena suvrata // SkP_11.20 //
GP12skp031pu:873: etadvaraṃ prayacchasva yadi tuṣṭo 'si naḥ prabho // SkP_11.21 //
GP12skp031pu:875: kanyā bhavitrī śailendra sutā te varavarṇinī /
GP12skp031pu:879: jyeṣṭhā ca sā bhavitrī te anye cānu tataḥ śubhe // SkP_11.23 //
GP12skp031pu:885: āśrite dve aparṇā tu aniketā tapo 'carat /
GP12skp031pu:889: pūrṇe pūrṇe sahasre tu āhāraṃ tena cakratuḥ /
GP12skp031pu:890: aparṇā tu nirāhārā tāṃ mātā pratyabhāṣata /
GP12skp031pu:891: niṣedhayantī hyu meti mātṛsnehena duḥkhitā // SkP_11.27 //
GP12skp031pu:892: sā tathoktā tadā mātrā devī duścaracāriṇī /
GP12skp031pu:893: tenaiva nāmnā lokeṣu vikhyātā surapūjitā // SkP_11.28 //
GP12skp031pu:899: anugṛhṇanti lokāṃśca tapasā svena sarvadā // SkP_11.31 //
GP12skp031pu:900: umā tāsāṃ variṣṭhā ca śreṣṭhā ca varavarṇinī /
GP12skp031pu:903: asitasyaikaparṇā tu devalaṃ suṣuve sutam // SkP_11.33 //
GP12skp031pu:904: yā tu tāsāṃ kumārīṇāṃ tṛtīyā hyekapāṭalā /
GP12skp031pu:907: umā tu yā mayā tubhyaṃ kīrtitā varavarṇinī /
GP12skp031pu:912: tvayā sṛṣṭamidaṃ viśvaṃ mā kṛtvā tadvināśaya // SkP_11.36 //
GP12skp031pu:914: brūhi kiṃ te jaganmātaḥ prārthitaṃ samprasīda naḥ // SkP_11.37 //
GP12skp031pu:916: yadarthaṃ tapaso hyasya caraṇaṃ me pitāmaha /
GP12skp031pu:917: jānīṣe tattvametanme tataḥ pṛcchasi kiṃ punaḥ // SkP_11.38 //
GP12skp031pu:920: sa tvāṃ svayaṃ samāgamya ihaiva varayiṣyati // SkP_11.39 //
GP12skp031pu:922: vayaṃ sadevā yasyeśe vaśyāḥ kiṃkaravādinaḥ // SkP_11.40 //
GP12skp031pu:923: sa devadevaḥ parameśvareśvaraḥ svayaṃ tavāyāsyati lokapo 'ntikam /
GP12skp031pu:924: udārarūpo vikṛtābhirūpavān samānarūpo na hi yasya kasyacit // SkP_11.41 //
GP12skp031pu:930: tataḥ sa bhagavāndevo brahmā tāmāha susvaram /
GP12skp031pu:931: devi yenaiva sṛṣṭāsi manasā yastvayā vṛtaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:932: sa bhartā tava deveśo bhavitā mā tapaḥ kṛthāḥ // SkP_12.1 //
GP12skp031pu:933: tataḥ pradakṣiṇaṃ kṛtvā brahmā vyāsa gireḥ sutām /
GP12skp031pu:934: jagāmādarśanaṃ tasyāḥ sā cāpi virarāma ha // SkP_12.2 //
GP12skp031pu:935: sā devī yuktamityevam uktvā svasyāśramasya ha /
GP12skp031pu:936: dvāri jātamaśokaṃ vai samupāśritya saṃsthitā // SkP_12.3 //
GP12skp031pu:938: vikṛtaṃ rūpamāsthāya hrasvo bāhuka eva ca // SkP_12.4 //
GP12skp031pu:940: uvāca vikṛtāsyaśca devi tvāṃ varayāmyaham // SkP_12.5 //
GP12skp031pu:947: tau prabhū mama dāne vai kanyāhaṃ dvijapuṃgava // SkP_12.8 //
GP12skp031pu:949: sa ceddadāti māṃ vipra tubhyaṃ tadrucitaṃ mama // SkP_12.9 //
GP12skp031pu:951: tataḥ sa bhagavāndevas tathaiva vikṛtaḥ prabhuḥ /
GP12skp031pu:952: uvāca śailarājaṃ tam umāṃ me yaccha śailarāṭ // SkP_12.10 //
GP12skp031pu:954: bhītaḥ śāpācca vimanā idaṃ vacanamabravīt // SkP_12.11 //
GP12skp031pu:956: manīṣitaṃ tu yatpūrvaṃ tacchṛṇuṣva mahātapaḥ // SkP_12.12 //
GP12skp031pu:958: varayedyaṃ svayaṃ tatra sa bhartāsyā bhavediti // SkP_12.13 //
GP12skp031pu:962: devi pitrā tavājñaptaḥ svayaṃvara iti śrutam /
GP12skp031pu:963: tatra tvaṃ varayitrī yaṃ sa te bhartā kilānaghe // SkP_12.15 //
GP12skp031pu:965: rūpavantaṃ samutsṛjya vṛṇīthā mādṛśaṃ katham // SkP_12.16 //
GP12skp031pu:967: tenoktā sā tadā tatra bhāvayantī tadīritam /
GP12skp031pu:968: bhāvaṃ ca rudranihitaṃ prasādaṃ manasastathā // SkP_12.17 //
GP12skp031pu:970: ahaṃ tvāṃ varayiṣyāmi nānyadbhūtaṃ kathaṃcana // SkP_12.18 //
GP12skp031pu:971: atha vā te 'sti saṃdeho mayi vipra kathaṃcana /
GP12skp031pu:972: ihaiva tvāṃ mahābhāga varayāmi manoratham // SkP_12.19 //
GP12skp031pu:974: gṛhītvā stabakaṃ sā tu hastābhyāṃ tatra saṃsthitam /
GP12skp031pu:975: skandhe śambhoḥ samādāya devī prāha vṛto 'si me // SkP_12.20 //
GP12skp031pu:976: tataḥ sa bhagavāndevas tathā devyā vṛtastadā /
GP12skp031pu:977: uvāca tamaśokaṃ vai vācā saṃjīvayanniva // SkP_12.21 //
GP12skp031pu:979: tasmāttvaṃ jarayā tyaktaḥ amaraḥ sambhaviṣyasi // SkP_12.22 //
GP12skp031pu:987: yatra tatra mṛtaścāpi brahmalokaṃ gamiṣyati // SkP_12.25 //
GP12skp031pu:994: tata evonmukhī sthitvā śilāyāṃ saṃviveśa ha // SkP_12.28 //
GP12skp031pu:995: unmukhī sā gate tasmin maheṣvāse prajāpatau /
GP12skp031pu:996: niśeva candrarahitā sā babhau vimanāstadā // SkP_12.29 //
GP12skp031pu:997: atha śuśrāva sā śabdaṃ bālasyārtasya śailajā /
GP12skp031pu:999: sa kṛtvā bālarūpaṃ tu devadevaḥ svayaṃ śivaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:1003: trātu māṃ kaścidetyeha grāheṇa hṛtacetasam // SkP_12.32 //
GP12skp031pu:1005: yāsyāmi nidhanaṃ vaktre grāhasyāsya durātmanaḥ // SkP_12.33 //
GP12skp031pu:1006: śocāmi na svakaṃ dehaṃ grāhagrasto 'pi duḥkhitaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:1007: yathā śocāmi pitaraṃ mātaraṃ ca tapasvinīm // SkP_12.34 //
GP12skp031pu:1011: śrutvā tu devī taṃ nādaṃ viprasyārtasya śobhanā /
GP12skp031pu:1012: utthāya pradrutā tatra yatra tiṣṭhatyasau dvijaḥ // SkP_12.36 //
GP12skp031pu:1016: taṃ gṛhītvā drutaṃ yāto madhyaṃ sarasa eva ha // SkP_12.38 //
GP12skp031pu:1018: athāha devī duḥkhārtā bālaṃ dṛṣṭvā mahāvratā // SkP_12.39 //
GP12skp031pu:1022: yo devi divase ṣaṣṭhe prathamaṃ samupaiti mām /
GP12skp031pu:1023: sa āhāro mama purā vihito lokakartṛbhiḥ // SkP_12.41 //
GP12skp031pu:1025: brahmaṇā vihito nūnaṃ nainaṃ mokṣye kathaṃcana // SkP_12.42 //
GP12skp031pu:1028: tena bālamimaṃ muñca grāharāja namo 'stu te // SkP_12.43 //
GP12skp031pu:1030: mā vyayaṃ tapaso devi kārṣīḥ śailendranandane /
GP12skp031pu:1031: nainaṃ mocayituṃ śakto devarājo 'pi sa svayam // SkP_12.44 //
GP12skp031pu:1035: dattaṃ tato bravīmi tvāṃ nāyaṃ mokṣamavāpsyati // SkP_12.46 //
GP12skp031pu:1036: atha vā te kṛpā devi bhṛśaṃ bāle śubhānane /
GP12skp031pu:1037: bravīmi yatkuru tathā tato mokṣamavāpsyati // SkP_12.47 //
GP12skp031pu:1040: tatkṛtaṃ nātra saṃdeho mānyā me brāhmaṇā dṛḍham // SkP_12.48 //
GP12skp031pu:1042: yatkṛtaṃ vai tapaḥ kiṃcid bhavatyā svalpamantaśaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:1043: tatsarvaṃ me prayacchasva tato mokṣamavāpsyati // SkP_12.49 //
GP12skp031pu:1046: tatte sarvaṃ mayā dattaṃ bālaṃ muñca mamāgrataḥ // SkP_12.50 //
GP12skp031pu:1048: prajajvāla tato grāhas tapasā tena bṛṃhitaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:1050: uvāca cedaṃ tuṣṭātmā devīṃ lokasya dhāriṇīm /
GP12skp031pu:1052: tapaso hyarjanaṃ duḥkhaṃ tasya tyāgo na śasyate // SkP_12.52 //
GP12skp031pu:1053: gṛhāṇa tapa etacca bālaṃ cemaṃ śucismite /
GP12skp031pu:1054: tuṣṭo 'smi te viprabhaktyā varaṃ tasmāddadāmi te // SkP_12.53 //
GP12skp031pu:1057: na viprebhyastapaḥ śreṣṭhaṃ śreṣṭhā me brāhmaṇā matāḥ // SkP_12.54 //
GP12skp031pu:1058: dattvā cāhaṃ na gṛhṇāmi grāhendra viditaṃ hi te /
GP12skp031pu:1059: na hi kaścinnaro grāha pradattaṃ punarāharet // SkP_12.55 //
GP12skp031pu:1062: tathoktastāṃ praśasyātha muktvā bālaṃ namasya ca /
GP12skp031pu:1064: bālo 'pi sarasastīre mukto grāheṇa vai tadā /
GP12skp031pu:1067: bhūya eva tapaḥ kartum ārebhe yatnamāsthitā // SkP_12.59 //
GP12skp031pu:1068: kartukāmāṃ tapo bhūyo jñātvā tāṃ śaṃkaraḥ svayam /
GP12skp031pu:1069: provāca vacanaṃ vyāsa mā kṛthāstapa ityuta // SkP_12.60 //
GP12skp031pu:1074: idaṃ paṭhedyo hi naraḥ sadaiva bālānubhāvācaraṇaṃ hi śambhoḥ /
GP12skp031pu:1075: sa dehabhedaṃ samavāpya pūto bhavedgaṇastasya kumāratulyaḥ // SkP_12.63 //
GP12skp031pu:1080: abhavatsa tu kālena śailaputryāḥ svayaṃvaraḥ // SkP_13.1 //
GP12skp031pu:1086: vṛṇuyātparameśānaṃ samakṣaṃ yena me sutā // SkP_13.4 //
GP12skp031pu:1088: iti saṃcintya śailendraḥ kṛtvā hṛdi maheśvaram // SkP_13.5 //
GP12skp031pu:1095: akṣṇāṃ sahasraṃ surarāṭ sa bibhrad divyāṅgahārasragudāttarūpaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:1097: āruhya sarvāmararāṭ sa vajraṃ bibhratsamāgātpurataḥ surāṇām // SkP_13.9 //
GP12skp031pu:1099: haimaṃ vimānaṃ sacalatpatākam āruhya āgāttvaritaṃ javena // SkP_13.10 //
GP12skp031pu:1103: daṇḍaṃ samādāya kṛtānta āgād āruhya bhīmaṃ mahiṣaṃ javena // SkP_13.12 //
GP12skp031pu:1107: vahniḥ samabhyetya surendramadhye jvalanpratasthau varaveṣadhārī // SkP_13.14 //
GP12skp031pu:1110: āpyāyayansarvasurāsureśān kāntyā ca veṣeṇa ca cārurūpaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:1113: tārkṣyaṃ samāruhya mahīdhrakalpaṃ gadādharo 'sau tvaritaṃ sametaḥ // SkP_13.17 //
GP12skp031pu:1114: tathāśvinau devabhiṣagvarau tu ekaṃ vimānaṃ tvarayābhiruhya /
GP12skp031pu:1117: sārdhaṃ sa nāgairaparairmahātmā vimānamāruhya samabhyagācca // SkP_13.19 //
GP12skp031pu:1119: varānurūpaṃ pravidhāya veṣaṃ vṛndaṃ samāgātpurataḥ surāṇām // SkP_13.20 //
GP12skp031pu:1120: gandharvarājaḥ sa ca cārurūpī divyaṅgamo divyavimānacārī /
GP12skp031pu:1121: gandharvasaṃghaiḥ sahito 'psarobhiḥ śakrājñayā tatra samājagāma // SkP_13.21 //
GP12skp031pu:1126: hetustrilokasya jagatprasūter mātā ca teṣāṃ sasurāsurāṇām /
GP12skp031pu:1127: patnī ca śambhoḥ puruṣasya dhāmno gītā purāṇe prakṛtiḥ parārthā /
GP12skp031pu:1129: evaṃ yatastāṃ na viduḥ sureśā mohastatastānpara āviveśa /
GP12skp031pu:1130: varārthamājagmurato vimūḍhā īśena yasmādvṛḍitāḥ kṛtāste // SkP_13.25 //
GP12skp031pu:1134: sarvartupuṣpāṃ susugandhamālāṃ pragṛhya devī prasabhaṃ pratasthe // SkP_13.27 //
GP12skp031pu:1136: mālāṃ pragṛhya devyāṃ tu sthitāyāṃ devasaṃsadi /
GP12skp031pu:1138: devyā jijñāsayā śambhur bhūtvā pañcaśikhaḥ śiśuḥ /
GP12skp031pu:1140: akasmādatha taṃ devī śiśuṃ pañcaśikhaṃ sthitam /
GP12skp031pu:1143: nirvṛteva tadā tasthau kṛtvā hṛdi tameva tu // SkP_13.31 //
GP12skp031pu:1144: tato dṛṣṭvā śiśuṃ devā devyā utsaṅgavartinam /
GP12skp031pu:1149: vajraṃ kṣeptuṃ na śaśāka bāhuṃ cālayituṃ na ca // SkP_13.34 //
GP12skp031pu:1150: bhago nāma tato deva ādityaḥ kāśyapo balī /
GP12skp031pu:1154: tasyāpi śiraso devaḥ khālityaṃ pracakāra ha // SkP_13.36 //
GP12skp031pu:1156: tasyāpi daśanāḥ petur dṛṣṭamātrasya śambhunā // SkP_13.37 //
GP12skp031pu:1157: yamasya stambhito daṇḍas tejo vahneḥ śaśeḥ prabhā /
GP12skp031pu:1159: balaṃ tejaśca yogaṃ ca tathaivāstambhayadvibhuḥ // SkP_13.38 //
GP12skp031pu:1160: atha teṣu sthiteṣvevaṃ manyumatsu sureṣu tu /
GP12skp031pu:1166: ajastvamamaro deva sraṣṭā hartā vibhuḥ paraḥ /
GP12skp031pu:1168: amṛtaṃ paramātmā ca īśvaraḥ kāraṇaṃ mahat /
GP12skp031pu:1170: iyaṃ ca prakṛtirdevī sadā te sṛṣṭikāraṇam /
GP12skp031pu:1173: prasādāttava deveśa niyogācca mayā prajāḥ // SkP_13.44 //
GP12skp031pu:1176: tata evaṃ tadā brahmā vijñāpya parameśvaram /
GP12skp031pu:1178: mūḍhāḥ stha devatāḥ sarve nainaṃ budhyata śaṃkaram /
GP12skp031pu:1180: ayaṃ rudro mahādevaḥ śarvo bhīmaḥ kapardimān /
GP12skp031pu:1181: ugra īśāna ātmā ca ajaḥ śaṃkara eva ca // SkP_13.48 //
GP12skp031pu:1182: devadevaḥ paraṃ dhāma īśaḥ paśupatiḥ patiḥ /
GP12skp031pu:1196: brahmādyā nemire tūrṇaṃ sarva eva sureśvarāḥ // SkP_13.55 //
GP12skp031pu:1197: tasya devī tadā hṛṣṭā samakṣaṃ tridivaukasām /
GP12skp031pu:1203: ślāghyaḥ pūjyaśca vandyaśca sarveṣāṃ nastvamadya hi /
GP12skp031pu:1204: śarveṇa saha sambandho yasya te 'bhūdayaṃ mahān /
GP12skp031pu:1205: kriyatāṃ cāśu udvāhaḥ kimarthaṃ sthīyate param // SkP_13.59 //
GP12skp031pu:1206: tataḥ praṇamya himavāṃs taṃ devaṃ pratyabhāṣata /
GP12skp031pu:1207: tvameva kāraṇaṃ deva yena śarvādayaṃ mama // SkP_13.60 //
GP12skp031pu:1209: udvāhaṃ tu yathā yādṛk tadvidhatsva pitāmaha // SkP_13.61 //
GP12skp031pu:1210: tata evaṃ vacaḥ śrutvā girirājñaḥ pitāmahaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:1211: udvāhaḥ kriyatāṃ deva iti devamuvāca ha /
GP12skp031pu:1212: tamāha śaṃkaro devaṃ yatheṣṭamiti lokapaḥ // SkP_13.62 //
GP12skp031pu:1213: tatkṣaṇācca tato vyāsa brahmaṇā kalpitaṃ puram /
GP12skp031pu:1223: pravavau sukhasaṃsparśa īśe bhaktiṃ prasādayan // SkP_13.67 //
GP12skp031pu:1225: devanadyo mahānadyaḥ siddhā munaya eva ca // SkP_13.68 //
GP12skp031pu:1228: tumbururnārado hāhā hūhū caiva tu sāmagāḥ /
GP12skp031pu:1233: gāyanti hṛṣitāḥ sarvā udvāhe parameṣṭhinaḥ // SkP_13.72 //
GP12skp031pu:1271: nānāpuṣparajaḥsugandhipavanaprahlādanī cetasāṃ tatrāgātkalahaṃsanūpuraravā devyā vivāhe śarat // SkP_13.91 //
GP12skp031pu:1277: agādhena tadā reje kṣīroda iva sāgaraḥ // SkP_13.94 //
GP12skp031pu:1285: prāleyadhārāḥ śaśipādagaurā gokṣīradhārā iva saṃnipetuḥ // SkP_13.98 //
GP12skp031pu:1293: manobhavodrekakarāḥ surāṇāṃ surāṅganānāṃ ca muhuḥ samīrāḥ // SkP_13.102 //
GP12skp031pu:1295: īṣatsamudbhinnapayodharāgrā nāryo yathā ramyatamā babhūvuḥ // SkP_13.103 //
GP12skp031pu:1296: ṛtoḥ svabhāvācca madodbhavācca phullāsu śākhāsu nilīnapakṣāḥ /
GP12skp031pu:1303: śuśubhuḥ kāryamuddiśya vṛddhā iva samāgatāḥ // SkP_13.107 //
GP12skp031pu:1307: parasparaṃ hi mālatyo bhāṣantya iva rejire // SkP_13.109 //
GP12skp031pu:1308: nīlāni nīlāmburuhaiḥ payāṃsi gaurāṇi gauraiśca sanāladaṇḍaiḥ /
GP12skp031pu:1309: raktaiśca raktāni bhṛśaṃ kṛtāni mattadvirephārdhavidaṣṭapatraiḥ // SkP_13.110 //
GP12skp031pu:1310: haimāni vistīrṇajaleṣu keṣucin nirantaraṃ mārakatāni keṣucit /
GP12skp031pu:1311: vaidūryanālāni saraḥsu keṣucit prajajñire padmavanāni sarvataḥ // SkP_13.111 //
GP12skp031pu:1314: śṛṅgāṇi tasya tu gireḥ karṇikāraiḥ supuṣpitaiḥ /
GP12skp031pu:1319: girau vavṛdhire phullāḥ spardhayeva parasparam // SkP_13.115 //
GP12skp031pu:1326: śrutvā śabdaṃ ṛtumadakalaṃ sarvataḥ kokilānāṃ cañcatpakṣāḥ sumadhurarutaṃ nīlakaṇṭhā vineduḥ /
GP12skp031pu:1327: teṣāṃ śabdairupacitabalaḥ puṣpacāpeṣuhastaḥ sajjībhūtastridaśavanitā veddhumaṅgeṣvanaṅgaḥ // SkP_13.119 //
GP12skp031pu:1343: nānāvādyaśatākīrṇe brahmā mama pitā svayam // SkP_13.127 //
GP12skp031pu:1348: dadāsi mahyaṃ yadyājñāṃ kartavyo 'yaṃ kriyāvidhiḥ // SkP_13.129 //
GP12skp031pu:1351: kartāsmi vacanaṃ sarvaṃ brahmaṃstava jagadvibho // SkP_13.130 //
GP12skp031pu:1353: hastaṃ devasya devyāśca yogabandhe yuyoja ha // SkP_13.131 //
GP12skp031pu:1357: triśca taṃ jvalanaṃ devaṃ kārayitvā pradakṣiṇam // SkP_13.133 //
GP12skp031pu:1360: vṛtte udvāhakāle tu praṇanāma vṛṣadhvajam // SkP_13.134 //
GP12skp031pu:1362: udvāhaḥ sa paro vṛtto yaṃ devā na viduḥ kvacit // SkP_13.135 //
GP12skp031pu:1378: namo vedarahasyāya vedāṅgāya namo namaḥ // SkP_14.5 //
GP12skp031pu:1398: namo muṇḍārdhamuṇḍāya paśūnāṃ pataye namaḥ // SkP_14.15 //
GP12skp031pu:1402: namo rudrāya vasave ādityāyāśvine namaḥ // SkP_14.17 //
GP12skp031pu:1403: namaḥ pitre 'tha sādhyāya viśvedevāya vai namaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:1404: namaḥ śarvāya sarvāya ugrāya varadāya ca // SkP_14.18 //
GP12skp031pu:1405: namo bhīmāya senānye paśūnāṃ pataye namaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:1406: śucaye rerihāṇāya sadyojātāya vai namaḥ // SkP_14.19 //
GP12skp031pu:1408: pradhānāya prameyāya kāryāya karaṇāya ca // SkP_14.20 //
GP12skp031pu:1414: namo vaiṣamyakartre ca guṇānāṃ vṛttidāya ca // SkP_14.23 //
GP12skp031pu:1416: śivaḥ saumyaḥ sukho draṣṭuṃ bhava somo hi naḥ prabho // SkP_14.24 //
GP12skp031pu:1420: draṣṭuṃ sukhaśca saumyaśca devānāmasmi bho surāḥ /
GP12skp031pu:1421: varaṃ brūta yatheṣṭaṃ ca dātāsmi vadatānaghāḥ // SkP_14.26 //
GP12skp031pu:1422: tataste praṇatāḥ sarve ūcuḥ sabrahmakāḥ surāḥ /
GP12skp031pu:1424: yadā kāryaṃ tadā nastvaṃ dāsyase varamīpsitam // SkP_14.27 //
GP12skp031pu:1426: lokāṃśca pramathaiḥ sārdhaṃ viveśa bhavanaṃ tataḥ // SkP_14.28 //
GP12skp031pu:1430: pārāśarya stavaṃ hīdaṃ śṛṇuyādyaḥ paṭheta vā /
GP12skp031pu:1436: sa bahirmanmathaḥ krūro devaṃ veddhumanābhavat // SkP_15.1 //
GP12skp031pu:1440: cakrāhvayasya rūpeṇa ratyā saha tamāgatam // SkP_15.3 //
GP12skp031pu:1446: prasādayaṃśca taṃ devaṃ papāta sa mahītale // SkP_15.6 //
GP12skp031pu:1449: patnī tu karuṇaṃ tasya vilalāpa suduḥkhitā /
GP12skp031pu:1450: devaṃ devīṃ ca duḥkhārtā ayācatkaruṇāyatī // SkP_15.8 //
GP12skp031pu:1451: tasyāśca karuṇāṃ śrutvā devau tau karuṇātmakau /
GP12skp031pu:1452: ūcatustāṃ samālokya samāśvāsya ca duḥkhitām // SkP_15.9 //
GP12skp031pu:1454: aśarīro 'pi te kāle kāryaṃ sarvaṃ kariṣyati // SkP_15.10 //
GP12skp031pu:1456: tadā tasya suto 'yaṃ syāt patiste sa bhaviṣyati // SkP_15.11 //
GP12skp031pu:1458: tataḥ sā taṃ varaṃ labdhvā kāmapatnī śubhānanā /
GP12skp031pu:1459: jagāmeṣṭaṃ tadā deśaṃ prītiyuktā gataklamā // SkP_15.12 //
GP12skp031pu:1461: evaṃ dagdhvā sa kāmaṃ tu śaṃkaro mūḍhacetasam /
GP12skp031pu:1462: provāca himavatputrīṃ bhaktyā munivarasya ha // SkP_15.13 //
GP12skp031pu:1463: vasiṣṭho nāma viprendro māṃ kṛtvā hṛdi tapyate /
GP12skp031pu:1465: evamuktvā sa devīṃ tu bhaktiprītyā tadā vibhuḥ /
GP12skp031pu:1470: uvāca bhagavāngatvā brūhi kiṃ te dadāni te /
GP12skp031pu:1471: dadāmi divyaṃ cakṣuste paśya māṃ sagaṇaṃ dvija // SkP_15.17 //
GP12skp031pu:1472: dṛṣṭvā sa tu tamīśānaṃ praṇamya śirasā prabhum /
GP12skp031pu:1476: namaḥ sahasraliṅgāya vahniliṅgāya vai namaḥ // SkP_15.19 //
GP12skp031pu:1478: namaḥ pavanaliṅgāya brahmaliṅgāya vai namaḥ // SkP_15.20 //
GP12skp031pu:1480: namaḥ parvataliṅgāya sthitiliṅgāya vai namaḥ // SkP_15.21 //
GP12skp031pu:1486: namaḥ puruṣaliṅgāya bhāvaliṅgāya vai namaḥ // SkP_15.24 //
GP12skp031pu:1488: namo rajordhvaliṅgāya sattvaliṅgāya vai namaḥ // SkP_15.25 //
GP12skp031pu:1490: namo vāyūrdhvaliṅgāya śabdaliṅgāya vai namaḥ // SkP_15.26 //
GP12skp031pu:1495: diśa naḥ paramaṃ yogam apatyaṃ matsamaṃ tathā /
GP12skp031pu:1496: brahma caivākṣayaṃ deva śamaṃ caiva paraṃ vibho /
GP12skp031pu:1497: akṣayatvaṃ ca vaṃśasya dharme ca matimakṣayām // SkP_15.29 //
GP12skp031pu:1503: yogaṃ ca paramaṃ sūkṣmam akṣayaṃ sarvakāmikam // SkP_15.31 //
GP12skp031pu:1505: dadāni te ṛṣiśreṣṭha pratibhāsyanti caiva te // SkP_15.32 //
GP12skp031pu:1506: damaḥ śamastathā kīrtis tuṣṭirakrodha eva ca /
GP12skp031pu:1507: nityaṃ tava bhaviṣyanti amaratvaṃ ca sarvaśaḥ // SkP_15.33 //
GP12skp031pu:1510: brūhi cānyānapi varān dadāmi ṛṣisattama // SkP_15.34 //
GP12skp031pu:1513: na syāddhi tattathā deva yathā vā manyase prabho // SkP_15.35 //
GP12skp031pu:1515: bhaviṣyaṃ nānyathā kuryād iti me niścitā matiḥ /
GP12skp031pu:1516: ahaṃ kartā bhaviṣyasya kathaṃ kuryāttadanyathā // SkP_15.36 //
GP12skp031pu:1517: tathā tannātra saṃdeho vihitaṃ yadyathā mayā /
GP12skp031pu:1526: kaṃ putraṃ janayāmāsa ātmanaḥ sadṛśadyutim // SkP_16.1 //
GP12skp031pu:1536: kena stoṣyāmi te deva yastvaṃ sarvajagatpatiḥ /
GP12skp031pu:1538: tvameva bhoktā bhojyaṃ ca kartā kāryaṃ tathā kriyā /
GP12skp031pu:1541: icchāmi dattaṃ deveśa eṣa me dīyatāṃ varaḥ // SkP_16.7 //
GP12skp031pu:1544: uvāca vacasā vyāsa diśaḥ sarvā vinādayan // SkP_16.8 //

GP12skp031pu:2092: aśrupūrṇekṣaṇaṃ dīnaṃ pādayoḥ śirasā natam // SkP_22.1 //
GP12skp031pu:2094: utthāpya nayane somaḥ aśrupūrṇe mamārja ha // SkP_22.2 //
GP12skp031pu:2096: nirīkṣya gaṇapānsarvān devyā saha tadā prabhuḥ // SkP_22.3 //
GP12skp031pu:2098: jāne bhaktiṃ tava mayi jāne cārtiṃ tavānagha /

GP12skp031pu:2103: iṣṭo mama sadā caiva mama pārśvagataḥ sadā /
GP12skp031pu:2106: saṃvāsaṃ samprayacchāmi tatra raṃsyasi sarvadā // SkP_22.7 //
GP12skp031pu:2109: sa tayā mālayā nandī babhau kaṇṭhāvasaktayā /
