GP12skp031pu:2112: uvāca brūhi kiṃ te 'dya dadāni varamuttamam // SkP_22.10 //
GP12skp031pu:2114: japyeśvara iti khyāto mama guhyo bhaviṣyati // SkP_22.11 //
GP12skp031pu:2117: siddhikṣetraṃ paraṃ guhyaṃ bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ // SkP_22.12 //
GP12skp031pu:2119: śubhaṃ vāpyaśubhaṃ vātra sarvaṃ bhavitṛ tacchubham // SkP_22.13 //
GP12skp031pu:2120: jāpyaṃ mānasaṃ tulyaṃ vai rudrāṇāṃ tadbhaviṣyati /
GP12skp031pu:2121: yatra tatra mṛtā martyā yāsyanti tava lokatām // SkP_22.14 //
GP12skp031pu:2123: uktvā nadī bhavasveti visasarja mahātapāḥ // SkP_22.15 //
GP12skp031pu:2124: sā tato divyatoyā ca puṇyā maṇijalā śubhā /
GP12skp031pu:2131: tasmājjaṭodā nāmnā tvaṃ bhaviṣyasi saridvarā // SkP_22.18 //
GP12skp031pu:2132: tvayi snānaṃ tu yaḥ kuryāc chuciḥ prayatamānasaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:2139: payasā śaṅkhagaureṇa devī devaṃ nirīkṣatī // SkP_22.21 //
GP12skp031pu:2145: tasmāḍḍhitkirikāṃ tāṃ vai uvāca vṛṣabhadhvajaḥ // SkP_22.24 //
GP12skp031pu:2148: taṃ tathābhyarcitaṃ vyomni dṛṣṭvā meghaḥ prabhākaraḥ /
GP12skp031pu:2154: prāvartata nadī puṇyā ūcurjambūnadīti tām // SkP_22.28 //
GP12skp031pu:2157: tacca pañcanadaṃ divyaṃ devaṃ japyeśvaraṃ ca tam /
GP12skp031pu:2158: trirātropoṣito gatvā snātvābhyarcya ca śūlinam // SkP_22.30 //
GP12skp031pu:2161: niyamenānyathā vāpi sa me gaṇapatirbhavet // SkP_22.32 //
GP12skp031pu:2163: mama pārśvādanapagaḥ priyaḥ saṃmata eva ca // SkP_22.33 //
GP12skp031pu:2164: japyeśvaraṃ pañcanadaṃ ca tadvai yo mānavo 'bhyetya jahāti deham /
GP12skp031pu:2165: sa me sadā syādgaṇapo variṣṭhas tvayā samaḥ kāntivapuśca nityam // SkP_22.34 //
GP12skp031pu:2172: gaṇānāvāhayiṣyāmi kiṃ vā tvaṃ manyase 'vyaye // SkP_23.2 //
GP12skp031pu:2175: sarvamarhati deveśa nandī putro mamāgrajaḥ // SkP_23.3 //
GP12skp031pu:2199: so 'ṣāḍhirnāma gaṇapo vyāsa tatra samāgataḥ // SkP_23.14 //
GP12skp031pu:2220: koṭīśatavṛtaṃ taṃ ca gaṇapaṃ so 'nvapaśyata // SkP_23.24 //
GP12skp031pu:2236: ugrasena iti khyātaḥ koṭīśatavṛtaḥ sa ca /
GP12skp031pu:2262: sa nāmnā viśruto loke grahāpyāyana ityuta /
GP12skp031pu:2272: viṣvaksenaḥ sahasreṇa annadastu śatena vai // SkP_23.48 //
GP12skp031pu:2274: mahāravaḥ sahasreṇa koṭīnāṃ gaṇapo vṛtaḥ // SkP_23.49 //
GP12skp031pu:2277: ādityamūrdhā koṭyā ca tathā caiva dhanāvahaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:2280: amoghabhūtiḥ koṭyā ca tathā dvau meghabhūtikau // SkP_23.52 //
GP12skp031pu:2296: lokāntakaśca dīptātmā hemakuṇḍala eva ca // SkP_23.60 //
GP12skp031pu:2299: ekaśṛṅgī ca vikhyātas tathā bhṛṅgiriṭiśca yaḥ // SkP_23.61 //
GP12skp031pu:2300: ete cānye ca gaṇapā guhyā ye ca mahābalāḥ /
GP12skp031pu:2320: praṇamya devaṃ devīṃ ca idaṃ vacanamabruvan // SkP_24.1 //
GP12skp031pu:2322: kimarthaṃ vayamāhūtā ājñāpaya kṛtaṃ hi tat // SkP_24.2 //
GP12skp031pu:2323: kiṃ sāgarāñchoṣayāmo yamaṃ vā saha kiṃkaraiḥ /
GP12skp031pu:2324: hanmo mṛtyumutāmṛtyur na bhavatvadya padmajaḥ // SkP_24.3 //
GP12skp031pu:2325: baddhvendraṃ saha devaiśca saviṣṇuṃ saha vāyunā /
GP12skp031pu:2326: ānayāmaḥ susaṃkruddhā daityānvā saha dānavaiḥ // SkP_24.4 //
GP12skp031pu:2333: śrutvā ca prayatātmānaḥ kurudhvaṃ tadaśaṅkitāḥ // SkP_24.7 //
GP12skp031pu:2341: evamukte bhagavatā gaṇapāḥ sarva eva te /
GP12skp031pu:2349: kṛtvā cakruśca tanmadhye tadāsanavaraṃ śubham // SkP_24.14 //
GP12skp031pu:2354: savatsāṃ surabhiṃ cāpi tasya pārśve 'tha dakṣiṇe // SkP_24.16 //
GP12skp031pu:2360: punarvasuṃ ca puṣyaṃ ca dvau matsyau varuṇālayau // SkP_24.19 //
GP12skp031pu:2361: svastikaṃ vardhamānaṃ ca śrīvatsaṃ caiva kāñcanam /
GP12skp031pu:2364: dhvajaṃ ca pūjitaṃ divyaṃ śaṅkhaṃ caivenduvarcasam // SkP_24.21 //
GP12skp031pu:2366: rājatānāṃ sahasraṃ ca pārthivānāṃ tathaiva ca // SkP_24.22 //
GP12skp031pu:2368: vāsoyugaṃ vṛkṣajaṃ ca virajaḥ sūkṣmameva ca // SkP_24.23 //
GP12skp031pu:2370: kuṇḍale cāmale divye vajraṃ caiva varāyudham // SkP_24.24 //
GP12skp031pu:2371: paṭṭisaṃ ca mahaddivyaṃ śūlaṃ cāśanimeva ca /
GP12skp031pu:2374: {}nalabhāṃ pāriyātraṃ ca varṣaṃ kaṅkaṇimeva ca{} // SkP_24.26 //
GP12skp031pu:2375: darbhāṃśca divyāṃ samidham ājyaṃ dhūpamathāpi ca /
GP12skp031pu:2380: rudrā rakṣāṃsi yakṣāśca aśvinau daityadānavāḥ // SkP_24.29 //
GP12skp031pu:2382: pṛthivī ca samudrāśca varṣāṇi girayastathā // SkP_24.30 //
GP12skp031pu:2384: nadyaḥ sarvāḥ samājagmuḥ paśavaścaiva sarvaśaḥ // SkP_24.31 //
GP12skp031pu:2385: lokasya mātaraścaiva pṛthivī svarga eva ca /
GP12skp031pu:2386: bhūtāni prakṛtiścaiva indriyāṇi ca sarvaśaḥ // SkP_24.32 //
GP12skp031pu:2387: tīrthāni caiva sarvāṇi dānāni vividhāni ca /
GP12skp031pu:2391: brahmā ca ṛṣayaścaiva viṣṇuḥ sānucarastathā // SkP_24.34 //
GP12skp031pu:2396: jayāṃ ca vijayāṃ caiva siṃhīṃ vyāghrīṃ tathaiva ca /
GP12skp031pu:2401: pārthiveṣu tadā vyāsa sarveṣveva gaṇeśvarāḥ // SkP_24.39 //
GP12skp031pu:2402: sauvarṇeṣu tu sarveṣu tīrthāni vividhāni ca /
GP12skp031pu:2404: rājateṣu ca kumbheṣu mantrāṃśchandāṃsi caiva ha /
GP12skp031pu:2409: veṣṭayitvā ca sūtreṇa devebhyaḥ pradadau vibhuḥ // SkP_24.43 //
GP12skp031pu:2410: sa jagrāha tadā brahmā ekaṃ kalaśamātmanā /
GP12skp031pu:2416: gaṇādhipāśca sarve te abhyaṣiñcanta nandinam // SkP_24.46 //
GP12skp031pu:2418: keyūre kuṇḍale caiva mukuṭaṃ hārameva ca /
GP12skp031pu:2419: paṭṭisaṃ śūlavajre ca aśanīṃ ca dadau svayam // SkP_24.47 //
GP12skp031pu:2427: gaṇānāṃ pataye caiva bhūtānāṃ pataye namaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:2436: paśūnāṃ pataye caiva jetre mṛtyostathaiva ca // SkP_24.55 //
GP12skp031pu:2440: sarvāndevāngaṇāṃścaiva pāhi deva namo 'stu te // SkP_24.57 //
GP12skp031pu:2442: evaṃ stutvā tato devas tasmai vyāsa mahātmane /
GP12skp031pu:2443: prāñjaliḥ prayato bhūtvā jayaśabdaṃ cakāra ha // SkP_24.58 //
GP12skp031pu:2445: tataḥ sarvāṇi bhūtāni brahmā śakrastathaiva ca // SkP_24.59 //
GP12skp031pu:2449: avādayanta gaṇapā harṣayanto mudā yutāḥ // SkP_24.61 //
GP12skp031pu:2452: paṭheta satataṃ martyaḥ sa gacchenmama lokatām // SkP_24.62 //
GP12skp031pu:2454: tasya kuṣmāṇḍarājebhyo na bhayaṃ vidyate kvacit // SkP_24.63 //
GP12skp031pu:2456: na bhayaṃ tatra bhavati grahebhyo vyāsa sarvadā // SkP_24.64 //
GP12skp031pu:2457: nandīśvaraṃ ye praṇamanti martyā nityaṃ prasannendriyaśuddhasattvāḥ /
GP12skp031pu:2458: te devadevasya sahādriputryā iṣṭā variṣṭhāśca gaṇā bhavanti // SkP_24.65 //
GP12skp031pu:2463: marutaḥ prāha sampūjya kanyārthaṃ sadasatpatiḥ // SkP_25.1 //
GP12skp031pu:2465: āmantrya nāmnā tānīśaḥ saśakraḥ sapitāmahaḥ // SkP_25.2 //
GP12skp031pu:2467: dātumarhatha tāṃ subhrūṃ snuṣāṃ mahyaṃ mahābalāḥ // SkP_25.3 //
GP12skp031pu:2471: tvayaiva deyā grāhyā ca tvaṃ no gatiranuttamā /
GP12skp031pu:2472: mā naḥ parāniveśāna yācanena vibhāvaya // SkP_25.5 //
GP12skp031pu:2473: pitā naḥ kaśyapaḥ śrīmān marīciśca pitāmahaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:2475: sa tvaṃ pitāmaho 'smākaṃ na parānkartumarhasi // SkP_25.6 //
GP12skp031pu:2477: suyaśāṃ marutāṃ kanyām ānayāmāsa tatkṣaṇāt // SkP_25.7 //
GP12skp031pu:2479: kaśyapaśca tathodgātā atriḥ sāma svayaṃ jagau /
GP12skp031pu:2482: viśvāvasū ruciścaiva hāhā hūhū tathaiva ca // SkP_25.9 //
GP12skp031pu:2485: ete cānye ca gandharvā jagurmadhurakaṇṭhinaḥ // SkP_25.10 //
GP12skp031pu:2486: urvaśī caiva rambhā ca ghṛtācī pūrvacittyapi /
GP12skp031pu:2492: tataḥ sa tu kṛtodvāho nandī gatvā mahāmanāḥ /
GP12skp031pu:2493: pādānvavande devasya devyā brahmaṇa eva ca /
GP12skp031pu:2494: śilādasya ca lokeśaḥ śriyā paramayā yutaḥ // SkP_25.13 //
GP12skp031pu:2496: varaṃ vṛṇīṣva putra tvaṃ snuṣā ceyaṃ tava priyā /
GP12skp031pu:2497: varaṃ dadāmi te vatsa anayā sahamīpsitam // SkP_25.14 //
GP12skp031pu:2500: sadā ca tuṣṭo bhava me sāmbaḥ saha gaṇeśvaraiḥ // SkP_25.15 //
GP12skp031pu:2501: pitaraṃ caiva me deva utpādakamimaṃ prabho /
GP12skp031pu:2505: pārvatyā sahito dhīmann idaṃ ca śṛṇu me vacaḥ // SkP_25.17 //
GP12skp031pu:2508: ajayyaścaiva jetā ca pūjyejyaśca sadā bhava /
GP12skp031pu:2509: ahaṃ yatra bhavāṃstatra yatra tvaṃ tatra cāpyaham // SkP_25.19 //
GP12skp031pu:2510: ayaṃ ca te pitā vipraḥ paramaiśvaryasaṃyutaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:2516: bhṛgau tasmiṃśca yaḥ prāṇāṃs tyakṣyate vai sudhārmikaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:2517: sa kāmacārī vaibhrāje gaṇapo 'sya bhaviṣyati // SkP_25.22 //
GP12skp031pu:2522: varaṃ vṛṇu yatheṣṭaṃ vai tāvidaṃ pratyuvāca ha // SkP_25.24 //
GP12skp031pu:2523: yuvayorastu bhaktirme tathā bhartari caiva hi /
GP12skp031pu:2524: nityaṃ cānapagā syānme dharme ca matiruttamā /
GP12skp031pu:2528: ūcaturmuditau devau snuṣāṃ tāṃ varavarṇinīm // SkP_25.26 //
GP12skp031pu:2530: varaṃ dadurmahāsattvāḥ sa vavre kāñcanaprabhaḥ // SkP_25.27 //
GP12skp031pu:2531: yuṣmāsu mama bhaktiśca aiśvaryaṃ cāpi saṃmatam /
GP12skp031pu:2532: vaśyāśca yūyaṃ sarve me priyo yuṣmākameva ca // SkP_25.28 //
GP12skp031pu:2537: ītīnāṃ dvārapālaśca pramathānāṃ tathaiva ca // SkP_25.30 //
GP12skp031pu:2538: mahābalo mahāyogī senānīstvaṃ hi no mataḥ /
GP12skp031pu:2539: tvaṃ bhūto bhūtanetā ca nāyako 'tha vināyakaḥ // SkP_25.31 //
GP12skp031pu:2541: tvamagrayodhī śatrughnas tvaṃ vīrastvaṃ divaspatiḥ // SkP_25.32 //
GP12skp031pu:2545: asmākaṃ varadaścaiva bhava bhūteśvara prabho // SkP_25.34 //
GP12skp031pu:2547: sa evaṃ gaṇapaiḥ sarvaiḥ stuto nandīśvaro vibhuḥ /
GP12skp031pu:2548: uvāca praṇataḥ sarvān brūta kiṃ karavāṇi vaḥ // SkP_25.35 //
GP12skp031pu:2549: ta evamuktā gaṇapāḥ sarva eva mahābalāḥ /
GP12skp031pu:2559: namo vaḥ sarvabhūtebhyo namo yogibhya eva ca /
GP12skp031pu:2561: namaḥ kāmacarebhyaśca nama ugrebhya eva ca /
GP12skp031pu:2562: mṛtyubhyaśca yamebhyaśca kālebhyaśca namo namaḥ // SkP_25.41 //
GP12skp031pu:2564: namo vo vadhakebhyaśca avadhyebhyastathaiva ca // SkP_25.42 //
GP12skp031pu:2568: namaḥ śvetāmbarasragbhyaś citrasragbhyo namo namaḥ // SkP_25.44 //
GP12skp031pu:2570: namo munibhyo gāyadbhyo japadbhyaśca namo namaḥ // SkP_25.45 //
GP12skp031pu:2572: namaḥ parvatavāsebhyo vyāghrarūpebhya eva ca // SkP_25.46 //
GP12skp031pu:2576: namo dhaneśarūpebhyaḥ sarvarūpibhya eva ca // SkP_25.48 //
GP12skp031pu:2578: namo vāmanarūpebhyo vāmarūpebhya eva ca // SkP_25.49 //
GP12skp031pu:2580: namo vaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ namo vaḥ sarvataḥ śubhāḥ // SkP_25.50 //
GP12skp031pu:2583: mama saumyāḥ śivāścaiva bhavantu gaṇanāyakāḥ // SkP_25.51 //
GP12skp031pu:2584: iti stutā gaṇapatayo mahābalāḥ śubhairvacobhiḥ suraśatrunāśanāḥ /
GP12skp031pu:2585: diśantu me sukhamatulaṃ sukhapradā balaṃ ca vīryaṃ sthiratāṃ ca saṃyuge // SkP_25.52 //
GP12skp031pu:2586: tapo 'kṣayaṃ sthānamathātulāṃ gatiṃ yaśastathāgryaṃ bahu dharmanityatām /
GP12skp031pu:2587: diśantu sarvaṃ manasepsitaṃ ca me sureśvarāḥ puṣṭimanuttamāṃ tathā // SkP_25.53 //
GP12skp031pu:2595: nisṛṣṭāśca tadā jagmuḥ praṇipatya vṛṣadhvajam // SkP_25.56 //
GP12skp031pu:2596: devāśca sarvalokāśca tato devaḥ svayaṃ prabhuḥ /
GP12skp031pu:2598: īpsitaṃ saha devyā vai jagāma sthānamavyayam // SkP_25.57 //
GP12skp031pu:2599: ya imaṃ nandino janma varadānaṃ tathaiva ca /
GP12skp031pu:2600: abhiṣekaṃ vivāhaṃ ca paṭhedvā śrāvayīta vā /
GP12skp031pu:2601: brāhmaṇaḥ sa mṛto yāti nandīśvarasalokatām // SkP_25.58 //
GP12skp031pu:2602: yo niyatastu paṭhetprayatātmā sarvamimaṃ praṇato bhavabhaktyā /
GP12skp031pu:2603: so 'pi gataḥ paralokavicārī nandisamo 'nucaro hi mama syāt // SkP_25.59 //
GP12skp031pu:2617: āsīnāṃ kāñcane śubhre āsane paramārcite // SkP_26.5 //
GP12skp031pu:2618: atha dṛṣṭvā satīṃ devīm āgatāṃ tu surūpiṇīm /
GP12skp031pu:2620: āsīnāṃ tāṃ ca sovāca menā himavataḥ priyā /
GP12skp031pu:2622: daridrakrīḍanaistvaṃ hi bhartrā krīḍasi saṃgatā // SkP_26.7 //
GP12skp031pu:2623: ye daridrā bhavanti sma tathaiva ca nirāśrayāḥ /
GP12skp031pu:2624: ume ta evaṃ krīḍanti yathā tava patiḥ śubhe // SkP_26.8 //
GP12skp031pu:2627: mahatyākṣamayā yuktā na kiṃcittāmuvāca ha // SkP_26.9 //
GP12skp031pu:2628: visṛṣṭā sā tadā mātrā gatvā devamuvāca ha /
GP12skp031pu:2630: anyaṃ vṛṇu mamāvāsaṃ bhuvaneśa mahādyute // SkP_26.10 //
GP12skp031pu:2633: anyatra rocitavatī nāvāsaṃ devi karhicit // SkP_26.11 //
GP12skp031pu:2635: kasmānmṛgayase devi brūhi tanme śucismite // SkP_26.12 //
GP12skp031pu:2638: dṛṣṭvā ca me tatra mātā vijane lokabhāvanī // SkP_26.13 //
GP12skp031pu:2640: ume tava sadā bhartā daridrakrīḍanaiḥ śubhe /
GP12skp031pu:2641: krīḍate na hi devānāṃ krīḍā bhavati tādṛśī // SkP_26.14 //
GP12skp031pu:2643: ramase tadaniṣṭaṃ hi mama māturvṛṣadhvaja // SkP_26.15 //
GP12skp031pu:2645: tato devaḥ prahasyāha devīṃ hāsayituṃ prabhuḥ /
GP12skp031pu:2650: mā krudho devi mātustvaṃ tathyaṃ mātāvadattava /
GP12skp031pu:2651: na hi mātṛsamo bandhur jantūnāmasti śobhane // SkP_26.18 //
GP12skp031pu:2653: na me 'sti bandhubhiḥ kiṃcit kṛtyaṃ suravareśvara /
GP12skp031pu:2654: tathā kuru mahādeva yathānyatra vasāmahe // SkP_26.19 //
GP12skp031pu:2656: sa evamukto deveśo devyā deveśvaraḥ prabhuḥ /
GP12skp031pu:2657: pārśvasthaṃ gaṇapaṃ prāha nikumbhaṃ nāma viśrutam // SkP_26.20 //
GP12skp031pu:2658: gaṇeśvara nikumbha tvaṃ gatvā vārāṇasīṃ śubhām /
GP12skp031pu:2659: śūnyāṃ kuru mahābāho upāyenaiva mā balāt // SkP_26.21 //
GP12skp031pu:2661: dhārmiko mama bhaktaśca mahāyogī mahābalaḥ // SkP_26.22 //
GP12skp031pu:2662: sa tvaṃ tathā gataḥ kuryā yathāsmai nāparādhyase /
GP12skp031pu:2663: tasyaiva cāparādhena śūnyāṃ vārāṇasīṃ kuru // SkP_26.23 //
GP12skp031pu:2667: tathā kariṣye deveśa yathā sa hi narādhipaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:2669: śūnyā vārāṇasī caiva bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ // SkP_26.25 //
GP12skp031pu:2672: jagāma puṇyāṃ lokeṣu purīṃ vārāṇasīṃ prabhuḥ // SkP_26.26 //
GP12skp031pu:2673: tatrāsau darśanaṃ svapne nāpitāya dadau gaṇaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:2674: maṇḍūkākṣāya rūpaṃ ca svaṃ tasyādarśayattadā // SkP_26.27 //
GP12skp031pu:2679: sthāpayasva ca tatrārcāṃ madrūpasadṛśīṃ śubhām // SkP_26.29 //
GP12skp031pu:2680: vittaṃ ca te pradāsyāmi putrānsaubhāgyameva ca /
GP12skp031pu:2681: priyatvaṃ caiva sarvatra gatiṃ cānuttamāṃ punaḥ // SkP_26.30 //
GP12skp031pu:2690: tasya pūjāṃ ca mahatīṃ prāvartayata śobhanām /
GP12skp031pu:2691: gaṇeśasya mahāsattvaḥ sa ca tāṃ pratyagṛhṇata // SkP_26.34 //
GP12skp031pu:2692: sa tasmai karmaṇā tena vittaṃ yadyatsamīhitam /
GP12skp031pu:2693: paśūṃścaiva hi putrāṃśca saubhāgyaṃ cādadatprabhuḥ // SkP_26.35 //
GP12skp031pu:2695: ārirādhayiṣurlokast asya pūjāṃ cakāra ha // SkP_26.36 //
GP12skp031pu:2697: homaṃ japyaṃ tathaivānye pūjāṃ cānye varārthinaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:2700: dadau sarvānabhiprāyān ye ye teṣāmabhīpsitāḥ // SkP_26.38 //
GP12skp031pu:2701: evaṃ taṃ kāmadaṃ jñātvā divodāso nṛpastadā /
GP12skp031pu:2705: saivamuktā tadā gatvā gaṇeśaṃ prāpya śobhanā /
GP12skp031pu:2708: tāvanna bhokṣye yāvanme varo 'dattastvayā prabho // SkP_26.42 //
GP12skp031pu:2709: jāte ca putre dāsyāmi śatānāṃ daśatīrdaśa /
GP12skp031pu:2712: kṣīrasya pañcagavyasya kariṣye snapanaṃ ca te // SkP_26.44 //
GP12skp031pu:2714: purastādbhojayiṣye te putre jāte na saṃśayaḥ // SkP_26.45 //
GP12skp031pu:2716: sadā sattraṃ ca pūjāṃ ca kariṣyati tava prabho // SkP_26.46 //
GP12skp031pu:2718: sā tamuktvā tathā vyāsa tasthau niyamamāsthitā /
GP12skp031pu:2719: sopavāsā tadā pūjāṃ mahatīṃ tasya kurvatī // SkP_26.47 //
GP12skp031pu:2720: tāṃ tathā tiṣṭhatīṃ devaḥ provāca sa gaṇeśvaraḥ /
GP12skp031pu:2721: uttiṣṭha nāsti te putro mā khedaṃ tvaṃ vṛthā kṛthāḥ // SkP_26.48 //
GP12skp031pu:2724: tato narādhipaṃ devī provāca vimanā tadā /
GP12skp031pu:2725: āryaputra na me putraṃ gaṇapo 'sau prayacchati /
GP12skp031pu:2726: bravīti nāsti te putro mā vṛthā niyamaṃ kṛthāḥ // SkP_26.50 //
GP12skp031pu:2728: evaṃ mahiṣyā sa proktaḥ svayameva narādhipaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:2731: mā sthā vṛtheha nṛpate na te putraṃ dadāmyaham // SkP_26.52 //
GP12skp031pu:2735: gaṇo vā tvaṃ piśāco vā bhūto vā rākṣaso 'pi vā /
GP12skp031pu:2736: kṛtaghnastvaṃ na saṃdeho na tvaṃ pūjāmihārhasi // SkP_26.54 //
GP12skp031pu:2738: viṣaye mama vāsī ca na ca putraṃ prayacchasi // SkP_26.55 //
GP12skp031pu:2739: pūjārho na bhavāṃstasmān matto daṇḍaṃ tvamarhasi /
GP12skp031pu:2742: sthaṇḍilaṃ ca babhañjāśu dadāhārcāṃ ca suprabhām // SkP_26.57 //
GP12skp031pu:2743: nikumbho 'pi kṛtārthaḥ sann ākāśe saṃsthitaḥ prabhuḥ /
GP12skp031pu:2744: uvāca taṃ divodāsaṃ pradahanniva tejasā // SkP_26.58 //
GP12skp031pu:2746: na datto yadyasau kopaḥ kastatra bhavato 'bhavat // SkP_26.59 //
GP12skp031pu:2748: tasmādvarṣasahasraṃ te purī śūnyā bhaviṣyati // SkP_26.60 //
GP12skp031pu:2751: deveśāya nivedyaivaṃ tasthau pārśvagataḥ prabhoḥ // SkP_26.61 //
GP12skp031pu:2752: rājāpi tasya vākyena tathyenārthena caiva hi /
GP12skp031pu:2754: atha sā tena śāpena purī vārāṇasī tadā /
GP12skp031pu:2756: tāṃ tu śūnyāṃ sa vijñāya devyā saha pinākadhṛk /
GP12skp031pu:2757: sagaṇo nandinā sārdham ājagāma mahādyutiḥ // SkP_26.64 //
GP12skp031pu:2758: sa tatra mānasaṃ divyaṃ vimānaṃ sūryavarcasam /
GP12skp031pu:2761: etāvacchakyate vaktum anaupamyaguṇaṃ hi tat // SkP_26.66 //
GP12skp031pu:2765: reme navendīvaraphullanetrā devī na sasmāra vacaśca mātuḥ // SkP_26.68 //
GP12skp031pu:2773: kathayaitanmama vibho yattvāṃ pṛcchāmi mānada // SkP_27.3 //
GP12skp031pu:2774: kiṃ phalaṃ tava deveśa labhante bhaktavatsala /
GP12skp031pu:2775: bhaktā ye phalamuddiśya kurvate tava kiṃcana // SkP_27.4 //
GP12skp031pu:2784: yathoktavānmayi brahmaṃs tathā tatkathayāmi te // SkP_27.7 //
GP12skp031pu:2788: tanme brūhi yathātattvaṃ paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me // SkP_27.9 //
GP12skp031pu:2791: devadevena pārvatyā yatpurā kathitaṃ hitam // SkP_27.10 //
GP12skp031pu:2794: hitāya devi bhaktānāṃ pṛṣṭaste kathayāmi te // SkP_27.11 //
GP12skp031pu:2795: prāsādaṃ yastu me devi śubhraṃ kuryādanindite /
GP12skp031pu:2797: vidhānena yathoktena liṅgaṃ me sthāpayecca yaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:2798: carate sa mayā sārdhaṃ nityamaṣṭaguṇānvitaḥ // SkP_27.13 //
GP12skp031pu:2799: kāñcanaṃ tuṭimātraṃ vā yo dadyādbahu vā mama /
GP12skp031pu:2800: tasya haimavate śṛṅge dadāni gṛhamuttamam // SkP_27.14 //
GP12skp031pu:2801: yo me gāstu hiraṇyaṃ vā dadyādavimanāḥ priye /
GP12skp031pu:2803: vṛṣabhaṃ yaḥ prayaccheta śvetaṃ nīlamathāpi vā /
GP12skp031pu:2806: sa me puraṃ samāsādya gaṇeśaiḥ saha modate // SkP_27.17 //
GP12skp031pu:2807: yo me puṇyaphalaṃ dadyād ātmanā pūrvamārjitam /
GP12skp031pu:2810: rathena vṛṣayuktena mama loke sa modate // SkP_27.19 //
GP12skp031pu:2812: dadāni brahmaṇo loke vāsaṃ tasya supūjitam // SkP_27.20 //
GP12skp031pu:2814: aśakto nāsti ca dravyaṃ yasya nityaṃ sumadhyame // SkP_27.21 //
GP12skp031pu:2815: sa tayā śraddhayā pūto vimuktaḥ sarvapātakaiḥ /
GP12skp031pu:2816: mama lokamavāpnoti bhinne dehe na saṃśayaḥ // SkP_27.22 //
GP12skp031pu:2818: sa mitraṃ yakṣarājasya yakṣo bhavati vīryavān // SkP_27.23 //
GP12skp031pu:2820: gandhāśca daśasāhasrā ānantyaṃ cārcanaṃ smṛtam // SkP_27.24 //
GP12skp031pu:2822: gandhodakaṃ pañcaśataṃ pañcagavyaṃ tathaiva ca // SkP_27.25 //
GP12skp031pu:2824: tasmācca sarpiṣā snānaṃ bhūyaḥ pañcaguṇaṃ tathā // SkP_27.26 //
GP12skp031pu:2831: dve sahasre palānāṃ tu mahiṣākṣasya yo dahet /
GP12skp031pu:2832: devi saṃvatsaraṃ pūrṇaṃ sa me nandisamo bhavet // SkP_27.30 //
GP12skp031pu:2833: dakṣiṇāyāṃ tu yo mūrtau pāyasaṃ saghṛtaṃ śubhe /
GP12skp031pu:2834: nivedayedvarṣamekaṃ sa ca nandisamo bhavet // SkP_27.31 //
GP12skp031pu:2836: śeṣāśca caravaḥ sarve yāvakārdhena saṃmitāḥ // SkP_27.32 //
GP12skp031pu:2838: prīṇāti ca pitṝnsarvān vimāne caiva modate /
GP12skp031pu:2839: chattraṃ dadyācca yaḥ so 'pi dīpyate tejasā divi // SkP_27.33 //
GP12skp031pu:2842: dadānyasya svakaṃ lokaṃ tuṣṭo 'haṃ devi śāśvatam // SkP_27.34 //
GP12skp031pu:2844: pūjito 'haṃ sadā bhaktyā putratve kalpayāmi tam // SkP_27.35 //
GP12skp031pu:2845: ekarātraṃ ca yo martyo dīpaṃ dhārayati sthitaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:2846: sarvayajñaphalaṃ tasya dadāni śriyameva ca // SkP_27.36 //
GP12skp031pu:2848: na māṃ paśyanti rāgāndhās tamasā bahulīkṛtāḥ // SkP_27.37 //
GP12skp031pu:2850: ekāgramanaso dāntās te māṃ paśyanti nityadā // SkP_27.38 //
GP12skp031pu:2851: ye me bhaktāḥ sadā caiva sāṃkhyayogaviśāradāḥ /
GP12skp031pu:2852: sarvaṃ paśyanti ca mayi māṃ ca sarvatra yogataḥ // SkP_27.39 //
GP12skp031pu:2854: gacchanti mama te lokaṃ tamo bhittvā sudurbhidam // SkP_27.40 //
GP12skp031pu:2856: dhyānino nityayuktāśca devi paśyanti māṃ budhāḥ // SkP_27.41 //
GP12skp031pu:2858: pādayostāni suśroṇi sadā saṃnihitāni me // SkP_27.42 //
GP12skp031pu:2860: mamaiva sa prabhāvena sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate // SkP_27.43 //
GP12skp031pu:2861: sarvathā vartamāno 'pi devi yo māṃ sadā smaret /
GP12skp031pu:2862: kalmaṣeṇa na yujyeta naraḥ kartā kadācana // SkP_27.44 //
GP12skp031pu:2864: yo 'bhyarcayati māṃ nityaṃ sa mamātmasamo bhavet // SkP_27.45 //
GP12skp031pu:2865: ṣaḍaṅgena ca yogena yo māmarcayate sadā /
GP12skp031pu:2866: praviśeta sa māṃ kṣipram atra nāsti vicāraṇā // SkP_27.46 //
GP12skp031pu:2868: so 'pi madgatamanā madarpaṇo yāti devi gatimapratarkitām // SkP_27.47 //
GP12skp031pu:2871: tato vyāsa punardevī patiṃ vratapatiṃ śubhā /
GP12skp031pu:2874: vrataṃ bhavati yādṛgvā tatprabrūhi maheśvara // SkP_28.2 //
GP12skp031pu:2881: taccaiva phalamāpnoti yamaṃ caiva na paśyati // SkP_28.5 //
GP12skp031pu:2883: sa tapyatyā nakhāgrebhyo nityaṃ yo māṃ samāśritaḥ // SkP_28.6 //
GP12skp031pu:2886: pṛthivībhājane bhuṅkte nityaṃ parvasu yo naraḥ /
GP12skp031pu:2887: sa trirātraphalaṃ devi ahorātreṇa vindati // SkP_28.8 //
GP12skp031pu:2888: saṃvatsaraṃ tu yo bhuṅkte nityameva hyatandritaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:2891: yo bhuṅkte devi naiteṣu saṃyatastu naraḥ samām // SkP_28.10 //
GP12skp031pu:2893: bhūtānāṃ dayitaścaiva divyaṃ rūpaṃ bibharti ca // SkP_28.11 //
GP12skp031pu:2897: sa vai varṣasahasrāṇi dviṣaṣṭiṃ divi modate /
GP12skp031pu:2898: divyarūpadharaḥ śrīmān devataiḥ saha nityaśaḥ // SkP_28.13 //
GP12skp031pu:2904: candanaṃ caiva dadyādvai yathāsaṃkhyena pūjitam // SkP_28.16 //
GP12skp031pu:2908: iha loke sukhī jāto māmeva pratipadyate // SkP_28.18 //
GP12skp031pu:2909: ratnāvaliṃ tu yo dadyād brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyo 'tha viṭ /
GP12skp031pu:2910: śūdraḥ strī vā sa me loke matsaukhyaṃ prāpnute param // SkP_28.19 //
GP12skp031pu:2914: manvantaraṃ ca goloke gokanyābhiḥ sa pūjyate // SkP_28.21 //
GP12skp031pu:2915: sarve devāstathā viṣṇur brahmā ṛṣaya eva ca /
GP12skp031pu:2916: kurvantyarghe hi sāṃnidhyaṃ tebhyastadviddhi niḥsṛtam // SkP_28.22 //
GP12skp031pu:2917: guhyametatparaṃ devi yo vetti sa mahātapāḥ /
GP12skp031pu:2920: kṣīreṇa yo māṃ satataṃ snāpayeta trirudyataḥ /
GP12skp031pu:2923: mānasasya ca jāpyasya sahasrasya phalaṃ labhet // SkP_28.25 //
GP12skp031pu:2924: saṃvatsaraṃ tu yaḥ kuryāt kṣīreṇa snapanaṃ śuciḥ /
GP12skp031pu:2925: gāṇapatyaṃ sa labhate vallabhatvaṃ ca nityaśaḥ // SkP_28.26 //
GP12skp031pu:2927: dvisāhasrasya jāpyasya mānasasya phalaṃ labhet // SkP_28.27 //
GP12skp031pu:2929: niṣkāṇāṃ ca suvarṇasya sahasrasya phalaṃ labhet // SkP_28.28 //
GP12skp031pu:2931: vitarāmi śubhaṃ lokaṃ nityaṃ tasya dhruvaṃ śivam /
GP12skp031pu:2932: sarvalokakṣaye tasya na kṣayo bhavatīśvari // SkP_28.29 //
GP12skp031pu:2933: liṅgapūjāṃ tu yaḥ kuryān mama devi dṛḍhavrataḥ /
GP12skp031pu:2934: śataṃ varṣasahasrāṇi divyāni divi modate // SkP_28.30 //
GP12skp031pu:2936: arkasya karavīrasya bilvasya ca bukasya ca /
GP12skp031pu:2937: suvarṇaniṣkaṃ puṣpe tu sarvasminneva kathyate // SkP_28.31 //
GP12skp031pu:2939: ekasminkaravīrasya datte puṣpe hi tatphalam // SkP_28.32 //
GP12skp031pu:2941: tadekasya tu padmasya dattasya phalamucyate // SkP_28.33 //
GP12skp031pu:2942: padmānāṃ tu sahasrasya mama dattasya yatphalam /
GP12skp031pu:2943: tatphalaṃ labhate pattre datte bilvasya śobhane // SkP_28.34 //
GP12skp031pu:2944: bilvapattrasahasre tu datte me yatphalaṃ smṛtam /
GP12skp031pu:2945: bukapuṣpe tadekasmin mama datte labhetphalam // SkP_28.35 //
GP12skp031pu:2947: puṣpe datte tadekasmiṃl labheddhuttūrakasya tu // SkP_28.36 //
GP12skp031pu:2948: nirmālyaṃ yo hi me nityaṃ śirasā dhārayiṣyati /
GP12skp031pu:2951: narake sa patedghore tiryagyonau ca sambhavet // SkP_28.38 //
GP12skp031pu:2953: tasya pāpamahaṃ śīghraṃ nāśayāmi mahāvrate // SkP_28.39 //
GP12skp031pu:2954: dīpamālāṃ tu yaḥ kuryāt kārttike māsi vai mama /
GP12skp031pu:2956: gāṇapatyaṃ sa labhate dīpyate ca raviryathā // SkP_28.40 //
GP12skp031pu:2958: yo me devi sadā mūrdhni sa me nandisamo bhavet // SkP_28.41 //
GP12skp031pu:2959: ye hi siddhārthakāḥ proktās tathā kṛṣṇatilāśca ye /
GP12skp031pu:2960: sarve te tvanmayā devi guhyametanmayeritam // SkP_28.42 //
GP12skp031pu:2961: citro nāma gaṇo mahyaṃ tena sārdhaṃ sa modate /
GP12skp031pu:2963: tyaktvā sarvāṇi duḥkhāni māmeva pratipadyate // SkP_28.43 //
GP12skp031pu:2967: sa prayāti divaṃ devi liṅgaṃ yo 'rcayatīha me // SkP_28.45 //
GP12skp031pu:2972: apṛcchatpuṣpyamāṇāsyā kena tvaṃ deva tuṣyasi // SkP_28.47 //
GP12skp031pu:2974: vacaḥ provāca bhagavāṃl lokānāṃ hitakāmyayā // SkP_28.48 //
GP12skp031pu:2976: śṛṇu devi yathātattvaṃ yena yānti śubhāṃ gatim /
GP12skp031pu:2977: trailokye jantavaḥ sarve madbhaktā ye śubhānane // SkP_28.49 //
GP12skp031pu:2979: yo hi tattvena tadveda saṃsārādvipramucyate // SkP_28.50 //
GP12skp031pu:2980: na ca prakāśayedguhyaṃ nāma te kīrtayennaraḥ /
GP12skp031pu:2983: yaśaḥ kīrtiṃ ca samprāpya rudraloke mahīyate // SkP_28.52 //
GP12skp031pu:2985: mantreṇa vidhivaccaiva tasya puṇyaphalaṃ mahat // SkP_28.53 //
GP12skp031pu:2988: namo bhagavate caiva guhyāguhyāya vai sadā // SkP_28.54 //
GP12skp031pu:2990: sarvaguhyāya vai svāhā devaguhyamayāya ca // SkP_28.55 //
GP12skp031pu:2991: sarvaguhyamayo mantraḥ svāhā somāya caiva ha /
GP12skp031pu:2992: kaṭaṃkaṭāya vai svāhā svāhā devāya śuṣmiṇe // SkP_28.56 //
GP12skp031pu:2993: puṣpāṇyetena mantreṇa yo me nityaṃ nivedayet /
GP12skp031pu:2994: sahasraṃ tena jāpyasya mānasasya kṛtaṃ bhavet // SkP_28.57 //
GP12skp031pu:2996: tilānāṃ caiva kṛṣṇānāṃ sarṣapāṇāṃ ca pārvati /
GP12skp031pu:2998: idaṃ ca vacanaṃ brūyāt sūryeti ca mameti ca /
GP12skp031pu:3000: arcayitvā ca māṃ devi yo me nāmāni kīrtayet /
GP12skp031pu:3002: so 'pi devi prapaśyenmāṃ viyoniṃ na sa gacchati // SkP_28.60 //
GP12skp031pu:3003: vāmadeva sudeveti hara gupteti vā punaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3004: umāpate nīlakaṇṭha śānta śrīkaṇṭha gopate // SkP_28.61 //
GP12skp031pu:3005: śarva bhīma paśupate śaṃkarogra bhaveti ca /
GP12skp031pu:3007: sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyeta divi devaiśca pūjyate // SkP_28.62 //
GP12skp031pu:3011: amāvāsyāṃ tu yo nityaṃ saghṛtaṃ gugguluṃ dahet /
GP12skp031pu:3014: idaṃ ca paramaṃ guhyaṃ yo me devi nivedayet /
GP12skp031pu:3017: imāni ca mahābhāge yo me nāmāni kīrtayet /
GP12skp031pu:3024: mahādevo mahādevo mahādeveti caiva hi // SkP_28.69 //
GP12skp031pu:3026: sa dehabhedamāsādya yogātmā gaṇapo bhavet // SkP_28.70 //
GP12skp031pu:3031: pūtaṃ pavitraṃ paramaṃ maṅgalānāṃ ca maṅgalam /
GP12skp031pu:3032: śrotavyaṃ na ca sarveṇa tathā deyaṃ na kasyacit // SkP_28.72 //
GP12skp031pu:3036: jagataḥ pitarau devau cakratuḥ kimataḥ param // SkP_29.1 //
GP12skp031pu:3038: tataḥ sa bhagavāndevo devīṃ himavataḥ sutām /
GP12skp031pu:3039: uvāca devi paśyāma udyānaṃ yadi rocate // SkP_29.2 //
GP12skp031pu:3041: evaṃ bhavatu deveśa yathāttha tvaṃ vṛṣadhvaja /
GP12skp031pu:3042: na hi me 'nyatra gantavyam udyānātparato hara // SkP_29.3 //
GP12skp031pu:3044: saha devyā tato vyāsa vārāṇasyāṃ vṛṣadhvajaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3052: saṃyuktaṃ sarvataḥ śrīmad vanaṃ vaibhrājasaṃnibham // SkP_29.7 //
GP12skp031pu:3054: asmindeśe purā devi tiṣṭhato mama śobhane // SkP_29.8 //
GP12skp031pu:3056: pīyatīnāṃ payo vegāt phenaṃ mūrdhni samāpatat // SkP_29.9 //
GP12skp031pu:3063: āśritaḥ soma āgatya saha gobhirna tāstyajat // SkP_29.12 //
GP12skp031pu:3066: na naśyanti yathā sadyas tathā sarvasurārcita // SkP_29.13 //
GP12skp031pu:3068: goprekṣaka iti khyātaḥ saṃstutaḥ sarvadevataiḥ // SkP_29.14 //
GP12skp031pu:3075: sāṃnidhyaṃ kṛtavāndevi sa cāyaṃ dṛśyatāṃ sthitaḥ // SkP_29.17 //
GP12skp031pu:3079: labhate dehabhede tu gaṇatvaṃ cātidurlabham // SkP_29.19 //
GP12skp031pu:3080: asminnapi pradeśe tu tā gāvo brahmaṇā svayam /
GP12skp031pu:3081: śāntyarthaṃ sarvalokānāṃ sarvā dugdhāḥ payomṛtam // SkP_29.20 //
GP12skp031pu:3083: bhadradohamiti khyātaṃ puṇyaṃ devavanaṃ śubham // SkP_29.21 //
GP12skp031pu:3089: brahmaṇaścāpi saṃgṛhya viṣṇunā sthāpitaḥ punaḥ // SkP_29.24 //
GP12skp031pu:3090: brahmaṇā sa tato viṣṇuḥ proktaḥ saṃvignacetasā /
GP12skp031pu:3096: dṛṣṭvainamapi deveśaṃ mama lokaṃ vrajennaraḥ // SkP_29.27 //
GP12skp031pu:3097: punaścāpi tato brahmā mama liṅgamimaṃ śubhe /
GP12skp031pu:3101: tasmātsvarlīna ityevaṃ guhyaṃ kṣetraṃ mama smṛtam // SkP_29.29 //
GP12skp031pu:3103: ānantyā sā gatistasya yogināṃ caiva sā smṛtā // SkP_29.30 //
GP12skp031pu:3105: vyāghrarūpaṃ samāsthāya nihato darpito balī // SkP_29.31 //
GP12skp031pu:3108: utpalo vidalaścaiva yau daityau brahmaṇā purā /
GP12skp031pu:3109: strīvadhyau darpitau sṛṣṭau tvayaiva nihatau śubhe /
GP12skp031pu:3112: jyeṣṭhaṃ sthānamidaṃ tasmād etanme puṇyadarśanam // SkP_29.34 //
GP12skp031pu:3114: na śocati punarmartyaḥ saṃsiddho mṛtyujanmanī // SkP_29.35 //
GP12skp031pu:3116: dṛṣṭvā tu niyato martyo dehabhede gaṇo bhavet // SkP_29.36 //
GP12skp031pu:3118: na ca muktaṃ mayā yasmād avimuktamidaṃ tataḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3119: kṣetraṃ vārāṇasī puṇyā muktidaṃ sambhaviṣyati // SkP_29.37 //
GP12skp031pu:3120: avimukteśvaraṃ māṃ vai yo 'tra drakṣyati mānavaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3121: gāṇapatyā gatistasya yatra tatra mṛtasya ha /
GP12skp031pu:3122: prāṇāniha tu saṃnyasya yāsyate muktimuttamām // SkP_29.38 //
GP12skp031pu:3123: pitrā te girirājena purā himavatā svayam /
GP12skp031pu:3124: mama priyamidaṃ sthānaṃ jñātvā liṅgaṃ pratiṣṭhitam // SkP_29.39 //
GP12skp031pu:3126: dṛṣṭvedaṃ manujo devi na durgatimanuvrajet // SkP_29.40 //
GP12skp031pu:3131: saṃgame devanadyostu yaḥ snātvā manujaḥ śuciḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3134: kṣetramadhye ca yatrāhaṃ svayaṃ bhūtvā samāsthitaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3138: dṛṣṭvedaṃ madhyameśānaṃ janma prati na śocati // SkP_29.45 //
GP12skp031pu:3142: mṛtaśca na punarjanma saṃsāre tu labhennaraḥ // SkP_29.47 //
GP12skp031pu:3149: paśya liṅgāni puṇyāni sarvakāmapradāni tu // SkP_29.50 //
GP12skp031pu:3151: kathitāni tava kṣetre guhyaṃ cānyadidaṃ śṛṇu // SkP_29.51 //
GP12skp031pu:3158: smṛtaṃ puṇyatamaṃ kṣetram avimuktamidaṃ śubhe // SkP_29.54 //
GP12skp031pu:3160: mama puṇyāni bhūrloke tebhyaḥ śreṣṭhatamaṃ tvidam // SkP_29.55 //
GP12skp031pu:3161: yataḥ sṛṣṭāni lokāni tataḥ kṣetramidaṃ śubham /
GP12skp031pu:3162: kadācinna mayā muktam avimuktaṃ tato 'bhavat // SkP_29.56 //
GP12skp031pu:3169: dṛṣṭvā na jāyate martyaḥ saṃsāre duḥkhasāgare // SkP_29.59 //
GP12skp031pu:3171: vilokya saṃsthite paścād devadeve maheśvare // SkP_29.60 //
GP12skp031pu:3181: sthitānāṃ sa tathā teṣāṃ devadeva umāpatiḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3182: saṃcintya paramāṃ mūrtiṃ babhūva puruṣaḥ prabhuḥ // SkP_29.65 //
GP12skp031pu:3185: tasya tāṃ paramāṃ mūrtim āsthitasya jagatprabhoḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3186: na śaśāka vapurdraṣṭuṃ hṛṣṭaromā girīndrajā // SkP_29.67 //
GP12skp031pu:3189: taṃ śaśāka vapurdraṣṭuṃ puruṣasya parātmanaḥ // SkP_29.68 //
GP12skp031pu:3195: stunvantī caraṇau gatvā ka ime bhagavanniti // SkP_29.71 //
GP12skp031pu:3199: kṣetrasyāsya prabhāvena bhaktyā ca mama bhāvataḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3200: anugraho mayā hyevaṃ kriyate muktidaḥ sadā // SkP_29.73 //
GP12skp031pu:3212: puṣkaraṃ naimiśaṃ caiva prayāgaṃ sapṛthūdakam // SkP_29.79 //
GP12skp031pu:3213: sandhyā saptaṛcaṃ caiva sarvānadyaḥ sarāṃsi ca /
GP12skp031pu:3218: praviśanti sadābhyetya puṇyaṃ parvasu parvasu // SkP_29.81 //
GP12skp031pu:3219: kedāre caiva yalliṅgaṃ yacca liṅgaṃ mahālaye /
GP12skp031pu:3221: śaṅkukarṇeśvaraṃ caiva gokarṇe ca tathā hyubhau /
GP12skp031pu:3222: drimicaṇḍeśvaraṃ caiva bhadreśvara tathaiva ca // SkP_29.83 //
GP12skp031pu:3225: yāni cānyāni puṇyāni sthānāni mama bhūtale /
GP12skp031pu:3226: tāni sarvāṇyaśeṣeṇa kāśipuryāṃ viśanti mām // SkP_29.85 //
GP12skp031pu:3228: teneha labhyate jantor vipannasyāmṛtaṃ padam // SkP_29.86 //
GP12skp031pu:3229: snātasya caiva gaṅgāyāṃ dṛṣṭena ca mayā śubhe /
GP12skp031pu:3231: sadya eva-m-avāpnoti kiṃ nvataḥ paramasti vai // SkP_29.87 //
GP12skp031pu:3233: nātaḥ parataraṃ devi budhyasvāstīti kṛtsnaśaḥ // SkP_29.88 //
GP12skp031pu:3236: sthānaṃ mamedaṃ himaśailaputri guhyaṃ sadā kṣetramidaṃ supuṇyam /
GP12skp031pu:3237: vimokṣasaṃsiddhiphalapradaṃ hi tattvaprabuddhā yatayo vadanti // SkP_29.90 //
GP12skp031pu:3238: kṣetre 'sminnivasanti ye sukṛtino bhaktāḥ sadā māṃ narāḥ paśyanto 'nvahamādareṇa śucayaḥ snātāḥ sadā matparāḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3239: te martyā bhayapāpaduḥkharahitāḥ saṃśuddhakarmakriyā bhittvā sambhavabandhajālagahanaṃ vindanti mokṣaṃ param // SkP_29.91 //
GP12skp031pu:3241: jāhnavyālaṃkṛtaṃ puṇyaṃ kṣetraṃ guhyatamaṃ mama // SkP_29.92 //
GP12skp031pu:3243: aśvamedhaśataṃ prāpya brahmalokaṃ ca gacchati // SkP_29.93 //
GP12skp031pu:3244: nātaḥ puṇyatamaṃ devi nāto guhyatamaṃ kvacit /
GP12skp031pu:3245: nātaḥ śubhataraṃ kiṃcin nātaḥ priyataraṃ mama // SkP_29.94 //
GP12skp031pu:3246: kṣetraṃ mamedaṃ surasiddhajuṣṭaṃ samprāpya martyaḥ sukṛtaprabhāvāt /
GP12skp031pu:3247: khyāto bhavetsarvasurāsurāṇāṃ mṛtaśca yāyātparamaṃ padaṃ tam // SkP_29.95 //
GP12skp031pu:3249: udyānāni tato devaḥ sthānāni ca tathātmanaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3250: ākhyāya himavatputryā vicacāra tadā punaḥ // SkP_29.96 //
GP12skp031pu:3251: so 'paśyata tadā vipraṃ tapyamānaṃ paraṃ tapaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3255: japyena vṛṣanādaiśca tapasā bhāvitaḥ śuciḥ // SkP_29.98 //
GP12skp031pu:3256: tamevaṃ vartamānaṃ tu bhaktyā paramayā yutam /
GP12skp031pu:3259: tuṣṭo 'smi varadaścaiva brūhi yatte manogatam // SkP_29.100 //
GP12skp031pu:3260: sa evamukto devena somaṃ dṛṣṭvā trilocanam /
GP12skp031pu:3261: praṇamya śirasā pādāv avandatparayā mudā // SkP_29.101 //
GP12skp031pu:3266: namaḥ somāya hemne ca hemamālādharāya ca // SkP_29.103 //
GP12skp031pu:3270: namaḥ siddhipradātre ca siddhisiddhāya vai namaḥ // SkP_29.105 //
GP12skp031pu:3274: svayaṃmantre ca manase durvijñeyāya vai namaḥ // SkP_29.107 //
GP12skp031pu:3280: saktāya caiva tapasi aiśvaryaniratāya ca // SkP_29.110 //
GP12skp031pu:3286: mahyaṃ sarvātmanā kāmān prayaccha bhagavanprabho // SkP_29.113 //
GP12skp031pu:3288: sa evaṃ stūyamānaśca bhaktyā paramayāpi ca /
GP12skp031pu:3289: tuṣṭastutoṣa bhūyo 'sya idaṃ cainamuvāca ha // SkP_29.114 //
GP12skp031pu:3297: yonayaḥ sapta gatvā tu yogaṃ sa samavāpsyati // SkP_29.117 //
GP12skp031pu:3298: jaigīṣavyaguhāṃ cemāṃ prāpya yo yokṣyate dvijaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3299: sa saptarātraṃ yuktātmā sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate // SkP_29.118 //
GP12skp031pu:3300: māsena pūrvāṃ jātiṃ ca pūrvādhītaṃ ca vetsyati /
GP12skp031pu:3301: ekarātraṃ gatiṃ śuddhāṃ dvābhyāṃ tārayate pitṝn // SkP_29.119 //
GP12skp031pu:3303: ato bhūyaśca kiṃ te 'dya jaigīṣavya dadānyaham // SkP_29.120 //
GP12skp031pu:3307: tvayi bhaktiśca nityaṃ syāt some sagaṇapeśvare /
GP12skp031pu:3308: anutsekaṃ tathā kṣāntiṃ śamaṃ damamathāpi ca // SkP_29.122 //
GP12skp031pu:3309: na cāpyabhibhavaṃ kuryān na ca tejovamānanām /
GP12skp031pu:3312: ete tava bhaviṣyanti ajayyatvaṃ ca yogibhiḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3313: icchato darśanaṃ caiva bhaviṣyati ca te mama // SkP_29.124 //
GP12skp031pu:3320: tapyamānaṃ tapo ghoraṃ sutaṃ viśravasastadā // SkP_29.127 //
GP12skp031pu:3324: bho bho viśravasaḥ putra cakṣurdivyaṃ dadāni te /
GP12skp031pu:3325: somaṃ paśya mahāsattva māṃ tvaṃ divyena cakṣuṣā // SkP_29.129 //
GP12skp031pu:3326: tataḥ sa dṛṣṭvā deveśaṃ sāmbaṃ nandipuraḥsaram /
GP12skp031pu:3327: praṇamya karṣitaḥ samyag utthātuṃ na śaśāka ha // SkP_29.130 //
GP12skp031pu:3329: uvācottiṣṭha bhadraṃ te balaṃ paurāṇamastu te // SkP_29.131 //
GP12skp031pu:3335: yā prabhoḥ sarvalokasya patnītvaṃ prajagāma ha // SkP_29.134 //
GP12skp031pu:3338: bubodha devī buddhvā ca cukopa parameśvarī // SkP_29.135 //
GP12skp031pu:3339: sā kruddhā tu kuberasya vāmamakṣi sudīptimat /
GP12skp031pu:3340: viśuṣkaṃ kakṣamādīptā dadāhāgneḥ śikhā yathā // SkP_29.136 //
GP12skp031pu:3343: mā krudho devi yakṣasya bhaktasyāsya tapasvinaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3344: yaśasvī dhārmikaścāyaṃ bhaktastvāṃ ca viśeṣataḥ // SkP_29.138 //
GP12skp031pu:3346: prasādaṃ kuru bālasya dhanadasya maheśvari // SkP_29.139 //
GP12skp031pu:3349: minoti na guṇāndeva kasmānmama puraḥ sthitaḥ // SkP_29.140 //
GP12skp031pu:3354: uvāca madhuraṃ ślakṣṇaṃ girīndratanayāṃ vacaḥ // SkP_29.142 //
GP12skp031pu:3355: bravīmi tvāṃ mahābhāge mā krudho jagato 'raṇi /
GP12skp031pu:3357: putraste 'yaṃ yato devi tasmānna kroddhumarhasi // SkP_29.143 //
GP12skp031pu:3359: na doṣo 'sti na caivāsya tvayi ceto vimohitam // SkP_29.144 //
GP12skp031pu:3361: prasādaṃ kuru deveśe kuberasya yathepsitam // SkP_29.145 //
GP12skp031pu:3366: kubera yatte duritaṃ kṣāntaṃ tatte mayānagha /
GP12skp031pu:3368: yattvidaṃ te mayā dagdham īkṣamāṇasya locanam /
GP12skp031pu:3369: vāmaṃ tathaiva bhavatu piṅgalaṃ dīptimacca ha // SkP_29.148 //
GP12skp031pu:3370: anena cāṅkito loke bhaviṣyasi na saṃśayaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3371: ekākṣipiṅgalo nāmnā khyātaḥ sarvatra pūjitaḥ // SkP_29.149 //
GP12skp031pu:3378: tuṣṭāva devaṃ devīṃ ca śirasā prāñjalirnataḥ // SkP_29.152 //
GP12skp031pu:3381: namo valayadhāriṇyai dhāriṇyai darpaṇasya ca // SkP_29.153 //
GP12skp031pu:3383: namo mekhaladhāriṇyai namo mauñjīdharāya ca // SkP_29.154 //
GP12skp031pu:3385: namo jñānāya tanave bhūtādhipataye namaḥ // SkP_29.155 //
GP12skp031pu:3388: namaḥ prakṛtaye caiva namo 'stu puruṣāya ca /
GP12skp031pu:3389: namo 'stu buddhaye caiva ahaṃkārāya vai namaḥ // SkP_29.157 //
GP12skp031pu:3390: namo 'stu rataye caiva sukhāya ca namo namaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3391: namaḥ kīrtyai karmaṇe ca ārambhāya samāptaye // SkP_29.158 //
GP12skp031pu:3392: namo yajñāya mantrāya dakṣiṇāyai ṛce namaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3393: namaḥ sāmne 'tha yajuṣe chandase ceṣṭaye namaḥ // SkP_29.159 //
GP12skp031pu:3394: namo 'gnaye ca vedyai ca svāhāyai haviṣe namaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3395: namo lakṣmyai śriyai caiva namo dharmāya vedhase // SkP_29.160 //
GP12skp031pu:3397: namaḥ siddhyai tathā puṣṭyai tuṣṭyai kṣāntyai namo namaḥ // SkP_29.161 //
GP12skp031pu:3398: namaḥ svadhāyai kavyāya havyāya ca namo namaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3399: namo vedyāya vidyāyai namaḥ śarvāya bhaktaye // SkP_29.162 //
GP12skp031pu:3401: mokṣāya muktaye caiva namaḥ kālāya mṛtyave // SkP_29.163 //
GP12skp031pu:3403: diśa no bhūtabhavyeśa yanme manasi saṃsthitam // SkP_29.164 //
GP12skp031pu:3405: ya imaṃ paṭhate nityaṃ stavaṃ prātaḥ samutthitaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3406: japaṃśca vipro vaiśyo vā śūdraḥ kṣatriya eva vā // SkP_29.165 //
GP12skp031pu:3411: uvāca varado 'smīti brūhi viśravasaḥ suta // SkP_29.167 //
GP12skp031pu:3413: tvattaḥ prasādaḥ satataṃ bhaktiśca tvayi śāśvatī /
GP12skp031pu:3414: bhagavaṃstvāṃ ca paśyeyaṃ vara eṣo 'stu me vibho // SkP_29.168 //
GP12skp031pu:3416: ātmanā saha sakhyaṃ ca dadāvātyantikaṃ tadā // SkP_29.169 //
GP12skp031pu:3422: astraṃ ca te prayacchāmi tava nāmnā bhaviṣyati /
GP12skp031pu:3428: ābabaddhāsya kaṇṭhe vai prīyamāṇa umāpatiḥ // SkP_29.174 //
GP12skp031pu:3429: prakāmaṃ darśanaṃ cāsya dattvā caiva dhaneśatām /
GP12skp031pu:3435: kulajñānabalopeto jāyate sa mṛto naraḥ // SkP_29.177 //
GP12skp031pu:3436: atha devī mahābhāgā sahitā śambhunā tadā /
GP12skp031pu:3445: tvāṃ kṛtvā hṛdi tapyante vara ābhyaḥ pradīyatām // SkP_29.181 //
GP12skp031pu:3447: pañcacūḍāḥ samāgamya vaca etaduvāca ha // SkP_29.182 //
GP12skp031pu:3449: dadāni vo varāniṣṭāny evo hṛdayasaṃsthitāḥ // SkP_29.183 //
GP12skp031pu:3452: devīṃ dṛṣṭvā praṇamyaiva śirasā pādayornatāḥ // SkP_29.184 //
GP12skp031pu:3455: namaḥ siddhyai namastuṣṭyai kriyāyai buddhaye namaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3456: namaḥ kīrtyai namaḥ satyai ulkajāyai tatheṣṭaye // SkP_29.186 //
GP12skp031pu:3457: namaḥ pṛthivyai kalyāṇyai śriyai lakṣmyai namo namaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3458: namaḥ sudhāyai svāhāyai svadhāyai ditaye namaḥ // SkP_29.187 //
GP12skp031pu:3459: namo 'stu taḍite caiva saudāmanyai namo namaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3460: sāvitryai cātha gāyatryai vedamātre namo namaḥ // SkP_29.188 //
GP12skp031pu:3462: namaḥ parvatavāsinyai rudrāṇyai ca namo namaḥ // SkP_29.189 //
GP12skp031pu:3463: namaḥ prakṛtaye caiva jyotsnāyai ṛddhaye namaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3465: gatyāyai gataye caiva indrāṇyai muktaye namaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3466: niyatyai sarite caiva gaṅgāyai sūtaye namaḥ // SkP_29.191 //
GP12skp031pu:3468: namaḥ saṃnataye caiva irāyai vṛttaye namaḥ // SkP_29.192 //
GP12skp031pu:3469: vāruṇyai ca śaraṇyāyai gauryai kālyai namo namaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3470: kauśikyai ca namaste 'stu kātyāyanyai namo namaḥ // SkP_29.193 //
GP12skp031pu:3471: namaḥ saṃnataye caiva mahimne ca namo namaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3472: aṇimāyai namaste 'stu laghimāyai namo namaḥ // SkP_29.194 //
GP12skp031pu:3473: pūjāyai te namaste 'stu śitibāhve ca sṛptaye /
GP12skp031pu:3474: saṃjñāyai ca namaste 'stu gire 'tha smṛtaye namaḥ // SkP_29.195 //
GP12skp031pu:3477: namaḥ siṃharathinyai ca śūlinyai ca namo namaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3478: namo mudgaradhāriṇyai kavacinyai namo namaḥ // SkP_29.197 //
GP12skp031pu:3480: namo dhanurdharāyai ca khaḍginyai ca namo namaḥ // SkP_29.198 //
GP12skp031pu:3481: namaḥ piñcchadhvajinyai ca dhāriṇyai paṭṭisasya ca /
GP12skp031pu:3482: namo 'stu bhūtamātre ca skandasya ca namo namaḥ // SkP_29.199 //
GP12skp031pu:3484: jātyai sarvarasānāṃ ca devatāyai vanasya ca // SkP_29.200 //
GP12skp031pu:3485: āryāyai ca namo nityaṃ śikhaṇḍinyai namo namaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3486: namo nīlaśikhaṇḍinyai dīrghaveṇyai namo namaḥ // SkP_29.201 //
GP12skp031pu:3488: namo dhṛtyai namaścityai kīrtaye ca namo namaḥ // SkP_29.202 //
GP12skp031pu:3489: strīṇāṃ saubhāgyadāyinyai dhāriṇyai ca namo namaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3490: rākānumataye caiva sinīvālyai namo namaḥ // SkP_29.203 //
GP12skp031pu:3491: namaḥ kriyāyai śraddhāyai medhāyai ca namo namaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3492: namo 'stu dhāraṇāyai ca ūhāyai ca namo namaḥ // SkP_29.204 //
GP12skp031pu:3494: namaḥ samādhaye caiva spṛhāyai vittaye namaḥ // SkP_29.205 //
GP12skp031pu:3496: namaḥ prabhāyai śuddhāyai śuddhaye śucaye namaḥ // SkP_29.206 //
GP12skp031pu:3498: dīkṣāyai dakṣiṇāyai ca jvālāyai ca namo namaḥ // SkP_29.207 //
GP12skp031pu:3499: indriyāṇāṃ pravṛttyai ca nivṛttyai caiva karmaṇām /
GP12skp031pu:3500: śrutaye sarvavedānāṃ bhavānyai ca namo namaḥ // SkP_29.208 //
GP12skp031pu:3503: namaḥ śāntyai namaḥ kāntyai namaḥ patnyai harasya ca /
GP12skp031pu:3504: namo 'stvadityai dānavyai vinatāyai namo namaḥ // SkP_29.210 //
GP12skp031pu:3505: namaḥ śivāyai kartryai ca prabhāvāyai namo namaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3506: mṛkaṇḍvai mārdabāhvai ca tathā surataye namaḥ // SkP_29.211 //
GP12skp031pu:3507: vinatāyai tathā lakṣmyai surasāyai namo namaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3509: diśa naḥ sumanāḥ sarvaṃ yatkiṃciddhṛdaye sthitam // SkP_29.212 //
GP12skp031pu:3511: ya idaṃ paṭhate nityaṃ naraḥ strī vā samāhitaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3512: sa rātriṣu kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ tyajetsarvamaśeṣataḥ // SkP_29.213 //
GP12skp031pu:3513: śayāno japate yaśca prayato vyāsa nityaśaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3514: divākṛtaṃ sa jahyāttu mṛtaśca sugatiṃ vrajet // SkP_29.214 //
GP12skp031pu:3523: sa bhūtvānucaro devyāḥ puṇye loke mahīyate // SkP_29.218 //
GP12skp031pu:3525: tābhirevaṃ stutā devī sthitā devasya saṃnidhau /
GP12skp031pu:3528: yaccāpi parayā bhaktyā māṃ prapannāḥ stha śobhanāḥ // SkP_29.220 //
GP12skp031pu:3532: sarvaṃ dāsyāmi tadvo 'haṃ mā cirāya taducyatām // SkP_29.222 //
GP12skp031pu:3534: devi puṃsāṃ striyaḥ sarvāḥ kāryārthaṃ viditaṃ ca te /
GP12skp031pu:3536: samāpte caiva tatkārye parā iva bhavanti naḥ // SkP_29.223 //
GP12skp031pu:3537: taddevi yadi tuṣṭāsi yadi deyo varaśca naḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3538: sarvastrīṇāṃ mahādevi bhavantu puruṣā vaśāḥ // SkP_29.224 //
GP12skp031pu:3541: sarve vaśyā bhaviṣyanti sarvakāryakarāśca ha // SkP_29.225 //
GP12skp031pu:3542: ādau paścācca sarvābhyo hiraṇyaṃ paśavaḥ striyaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3543: sarvabhogāṃśca dāsyantu vaśagāḥ sarvathāpi ca // SkP_29.226 //
GP12skp031pu:3545: priyā eva bhaviṣyanti pāpaṃ na ca bhavetsadā // SkP_29.227 //
GP12skp031pu:3549: naiva drakṣyanti te puṃso madvarānmohitendriyāḥ // SkP_29.229 //
GP12skp031pu:3551: tataḥ sā devadevasya patnī himavataḥ sutā /
GP12skp031pu:3553: bhava nārya iti prāha hasantī priyamavyayā // SkP_29.230 //
GP12skp031pu:3560: narāḥ sarve ca yuṣmāsu bhaviṣyanti sadā ratāḥ // SkP_29.233 //
GP12skp031pu:3561: vṛttiḥ śubhā bhavitrī ca sarvāsāṃ mama tejasā /
GP12skp031pu:3562: puṃsāṃ strībhogasiddhyarthaṃ strīṇāṃ ratyarthameva ca // SkP_29.234 //
GP12skp031pu:3563: kriyāḥ śubhāṅgasaṃskārā divyā ye mānuṣāśca ha /
GP12skp031pu:3564: bahurūpāśca tā bhūtvā viviśuḥ sarvadāṅganāḥ // SkP_29.235 //
GP12skp031pu:3566: evaṃ devī tadā vyāsa sṛṣṭvā tā vai visṛjya ca /
GP12skp031pu:3567: uvācāpsaraso brūta kiṃ vo bhūyaḥ karomyaham // SkP_29.236 //
GP12skp031pu:3570: tā uvāca tato devī evaṃ loke bhaviṣyatu // SkP_29.237 //
GP12skp031pu:3571: tataḥ sa sahito devyā sanandī parameśvaraḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3578: annadatvaṃ ca samprāpto vārāṇasyāṃ mahādyutiḥ // SkP_30.1 //
GP12skp031pu:3579: kṣetrapālaḥ kathaṃ jātaḥ priyatvaṃ ca kathaṃ gataḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3580: etadicchāmi kathitaṃ śrotuṃ brahmasuta tvayā // SkP_30.2 //
GP12skp031pu:3582: śṛṇu vyāsa yathā lebhe gaṇeśatvaṃ sa piṅgalaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3583: annadatvaṃ ca lokānāṃ sthānaṃ vārāṇasīṃ ca hi // SkP_30.3 //
GP12skp031pu:3585: harikeśa iti khyāto brahmaṇyo dhārmikaśca ha // SkP_30.4 //
GP12skp031pu:3591: na tvā putramahaṃ manye durjāto yastvamanyathā // SkP_30.7 //
GP12skp031pu:3595: maivaṃ kārṣīrna no vṛttir evaṃ dṛṣṭā mahātmanām /
GP12skp031pu:3596: svayambhuvā yathā sṛṣṭā saiva vṛttiḥ praśasyate // SkP_30.9 //
GP12skp031pu:3598: duṣṭā caivāpraśastā ca garhitā sādhubhiḥ sadā /
GP12skp031pu:3599: vṛttiḥ svayambhuvā sṛṣṭā tyaktavyā yadi no bhavet /
GP12skp031pu:3602: devatvaṃ no vimārgeyur mānuṣyāṃ jātimeva ca // SkP_30.11 //
GP12skp031pu:3604: mamāpi vihitaṃ paśya karmaitannātra saṃśayaḥ // SkP_30.12 //
GP12skp031pu:3607: uvāca niṣkrama kṣipraṃ gaccha tvaṃ yatra rocate // SkP_30.13 //
GP12skp031pu:3620: kṣetrasya caiva māhātmyaṃ śrotuṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me /
GP12skp031pu:3624: nirjagāma ca deveśaḥ pārvatyā saha śaṃkaraḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3625: udyānaṃ darśayāmāsa devyā devaḥ pinākadhṛk // SkP_30.22 //
GP12skp031pu:3627: virūḍhapuṣpaiḥ paritaḥ priyaṅgubhiḥ supuṣpitaiḥ kaṇṭakitaiśca ketakaiḥ // SkP_30.23 //
GP12skp031pu:3649: rātrau candrasya bhāsā kusumitatilakairekatāṃ samprayātaṃ chāyāsuptaprabuddhasthitahariṇakulāluptadarbhāṅkurāgram // SkP_30.34 //
GP12skp031pu:3651: māyūraiḥ pakṣacandraiḥ kvacidapi patitai rañjitakṣmāpradeśaṃ deśe deśe nilīnapramuditavilasanmattahārītavṛndam // SkP_30.35 //
GP12skp031pu:3653: hṛṣṭābhiḥ kvacidapi kiṃnarāṅganābhiḥ kṣīvābhiḥ sumadhuragītavṛkṣaṣaṇḍam // SkP_30.36 //
GP12skp031pu:3655: ā mūlātphalanicitaiḥ kvacidviśālair uttuṅgaiḥ panasamahīruhairupetam // SkP_30.37 //
GP12skp031pu:3667: vividhataruviśālaṃ mattahṛṣṭānyapuṣṭam upavanamatiramyaṃ darśayāmāsa devyāḥ // SkP_30.43 //
GP12skp031pu:3669: udyānaṃ darśitaṃ deva śobhayā parayā yutam /
GP12skp031pu:3672: śrutvāpi na hi me tṛptir ato bhūyo vadasva me // SkP_30.45 //
GP12skp031pu:3674: idaṃ guhyatamaṃ kṣetraṃ sadā vārāṇasī mama /
GP12skp031pu:3678: abhyasyanti paraṃ yogaṃ yuktātmāno jitendriyāḥ // SkP_30.47 //
GP12skp031pu:3682: rocate me sadāvāso yena kāryeṇa tacchṛṇu // SkP_30.49 //
GP12skp031pu:3684: yathā mokṣamihāpnoti anyatra na tathā kvacit // SkP_30.50 //
GP12skp031pu:3686: brahmādayo vijānanti ye ca siddhā mumukṣavaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3687: ataḥ priyamidaṃ kṣetram asmācceha ratirmama // SkP_30.51 //
GP12skp031pu:3688: vimuktaṃ na mayā yasmān mokṣyate vā kadācana /
GP12skp031pu:3689: mama kṣetramidaṃ tasmād avimuktamiti smṛtam // SkP_30.52 //
GP12skp031pu:3692: iha samprāpyate yena tata etadviśiṣyate // SkP_30.53 //
GP12skp031pu:3693: prayāge vā bhavenmokṣa iha vā matparigrahāt /
GP12skp031pu:3695: jaigīṣavyaḥ parāṃ siddhiṃ yo gataḥ sa mahātapāḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3696: asya kṣetrasya māhātmyād bhaktyā ca mama bhāvataḥ // SkP_30.55 //
GP12skp031pu:3699: kaivalyaṃ paramaṃ yāti devānāmapi durlabham // SkP_30.56 //
GP12skp031pu:3701: iha samprāpyate mokṣo durlabho 'nyatra karhicit // SkP_30.57 //
GP12skp031pu:3703: ātmanaścaiva sāyujyam īpsitaṃ sthānameva ca // SkP_30.58 //
GP12skp031pu:3706: saṃvarto bhavitā yaśca so 'pi bhaktyā mamaiva tu /
GP12skp031pu:3707: ihaivārādhya māṃ devi siddhiṃ yāsyatyanuttamām // SkP_30.60 //
GP12skp031pu:3713: upāsate mahātmānaḥ sarve māmiha suvrate // SkP_30.62 //
GP12skp031pu:3714: anye ca yoginaḥ siddhāś channarūpā mahāvrate /
GP12skp031pu:3718: sphītāṃ janapadākīrṇāṃ bhuktvā ca suciraṃ nṛpaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3724: iha kṣetre mṛtaḥ so 'pi saṃsāraṃ na punarviśet // SkP_30.67 //
GP12skp031pu:3726: vratinaśca nirārambhāḥ sarvato mayi bhāvitāḥ // SkP_30.68 //
GP12skp031pu:3728: gatā eva paraṃ mokṣaṃ prasādānmama suvrate // SkP_30.69 //
GP12skp031pu:3732: avimuktasya kathitaṃ mayā te guhyamuttamam // SkP_30.71 //
GP12skp031pu:3734: etadbudhyanti yogajñā ye ca yogīśvarā bhuvi // SkP_30.72 //
GP12skp031pu:3735: etadeva paraṃ jñānam etadeva paraṃ śivam /
GP12skp031pu:3736: etadeva paraṃ brahma etadeva paraṃ padam // SkP_30.73 //
GP12skp031pu:3737: vārāṇasīti bhuvanatrayasārabhūtā ramyā purī mama sadā girirājaputri /
GP12skp031pu:3738: atrāgatā vividhaduṣkṛtakāriṇo 'pi pāpakṣayādvirajasaḥ pratibhānti martyāḥ // SkP_30.74 //
GP12skp031pu:3739: etatsmṛtaṃ priyatamaṃ mama devi nityaṃ kṣetraṃ vicitratarugulmanikāmapuṣpam /
GP12skp031pu:3740: asminmṛtāstanubhṛtaḥ padamāpnuvanti mokṣākhyamenasi ratāpi na saṃśayo 'tra // SkP_30.75 //
GP12skp031pu:3744: prayāma dātuṃ yakṣāya varaṃ bhaktāya bhāvini // SkP_31.1 //
GP12skp031pu:3746: arho varamasau labdham asmatto bhuvaneśvari // SkP_31.2 //
GP12skp031pu:3747: evamuktvā tato devaḥ saha devyā jagatpatiḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3748: jagāma yakṣo yatrāste kṛśo dhamanisaṃtataḥ // SkP_31.3 //
GP12skp031pu:3749: taṃ dṛṣṭvā praṇataṃ bhaktyā harikeśaṃ vṛṣadhvajaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3755: balaṃ dadāni te pūrvaṃ traikālyaṃ darśanaṃ tathā /
GP12skp031pu:3756: sāvarṇyaṃ ca śarīrasya paśya māṃ vigatajvaraḥ // SkP_31.6 //
GP12skp031pu:3758: tataḥ sa labdhvā tu varaṃ śarīreṇākṣatena ca /
GP12skp031pu:3759: pādayoḥ praṇatastasthau kṛtvā śirasi cāñjalim // SkP_31.7 //
GP12skp031pu:3760: uvāca sa tadā yakṣo varado 'smīti coditaḥ /
GP12skp031pu:3761: bhagavanbhaktimagryāṃ tu tvayyananyāṃ vidhatsva me // SkP_31.8 //
GP12skp031pu:3763: avimukte ca te sthāne paśyeyaṃ sarvadā yathā /
GP12skp031pu:3771: tryakṣaśca daṇḍapāṇiśca mahāyogī tathaiva ca // SkP_31.12 //
GP12skp031pu:3775: evaṃ sa bhagavānvyāsa yakṣaṃ kṛtvā gaṇeśvaram /
GP12skp031pu:3776: jagāma dhāma deveśaḥ saha tena sureśvaraḥ // SkP_31.14 //
